Name: James
Pos_Review: Spacious room, perfect location (5 mins walk to Ben Thanh Market), Netflix available!
Neg_Review: No escalator (we were okay w this but if youâ€™re bringing elderly family members might not be suitable)

Name: Anna
Pos_Review: Nice spacious room, comfy big bed!
Neg_Review: Bathroom was very small and had a few cockroaches but did the job!

Name: Sonia
Pos_Review: Good value for money, very friendly and helpful host (we communicated over WhatsApp, place is pretty much self-access), comfortable room and super convenient location close to Ben Thanh Market and everything across District1.
Neg_Review: Room was on ground floor with little natural light and a bit damp, but it was nonetheless comfortable.

Name: Iyer
Pos_Review: The location, wifi was very good...its a self check-in hotel/apartment....very easy instructions....all in all a good experience... definitely recommended.
Neg_Review: The bathroom was small but not an issue for me...in case its a requirement for any this review may help....but huge rooms with all basic amenities present.... scooty and laundry service is not available but the caretaker will provide you with the number for it.

Name: Sporne
Pos_Review:
Spacious room in great location.
It was clean and had everything you need
Neg_Review:
Communication through whatsapp for several days gave additional stress.
They want you to check in before 17.00 and know exact time which is challenging when travelling by air.
My flight was delayed and when I landed, I texted hotel first rather than my loved ones.
Also, there was miscommunication regarding payment.

Im sure the hotel just wants its best for its guests, but when travelling, this is just something I do not want to deal with.

Name: Nima
Pos_Review: The location is perfect and central
Neg_Review: The main problem was (at least from my room) you could hear loud music of the club nearby and it was hard to sleep

Name: Simon
Pos_Review: Very clean and well located
Neg_Review: A bit of noise from outside

Name: Snorre
Pos_Review: Very affordable place with a good location and a large room.
Neg_Review: Some of the information about facilities is inaccurate on Booking.com(there is no laundry and no daily cleaning) and the hotell and room smelled of more incense than what feels comfortable.

Name: Maria
Pos_Review: Friendly stuff, nice room, location very central
Neg_Review:
Noisy in the night due to night club
Stairs without elevator (was not problem for us but worth considering while planning)

Name: Martin
Neg_Review: The room at night could be noisy due to a local bar/nightclub. On some nights this could last until 2 or 3 in tthe morning.

Name: Laura
Pos_Review: The location was great for a first stop in the city. The market, museums and parks are in walking distance.
Neg_Review: The toilet/ shower space was very small.

Name: Adriana
Pos_Review: A good base for exploring the city. The room is large and spacious.
Neg_Review: There were ants in the room.

Name: David
Pos_Review: Close to bus station. Easy to go around
Neg_Review: N/a

Name: Sze
Pos_Review: helpful owner

Name: Zoralis
Pos_Review: The location is great, central and lively; I was able to walk everywhere. The room was nicely decorated too, clean, and had everything I needed.
Neg_Review: You can hear (and feel) the music from nearby bars, but I was able to sleep with ear plugs.

Name: Samsideth
Pos_Review: Simply good with helpful manager
Neg_Review: Cleanliness

Name: Corinne
Pos_Review: The window was lovely, the bed was very comfy & the location was really good. It was quiet & easy to leave in the morning without hassles of waking up reception etc.
Neg_Review: There was NO bathroom in this room.  There was a normal size toilet & a shower head had been nailed to the wall in it.  There was a wash basin in the main large room where the bed was. Unsure who designed this but it was odd.

Name: Thinh
Pos_Review: Surround to many great restaurants and eateries, convenient for enjoying Vietnam cuisine.

Name: Vonpaea
Pos_Review: Good value for money.

Name: Worawut
Pos_Review:
Friendly staffs
new facility 
great location walkable to venues
Neg_Review: Room not sound proof you can still hear beats from the next building anyway it doesn't bother me I can sleep with peace.

Name: Tuyáº¿n
Pos_Review: Comfortable room

Name: Ashley
Pos_Review: Nice reception staff. Good location. Comfortable bed. However, we were on the top floor and there must be a night club in the next building (played loud music that thumped through our room till 3am each night)â€¦. Shower was quite average and was over the toilet. Drains didnâ€™t smell great and the bathroom sink in the room just drains onto the bathroom floor â€¦ also think there was mice in the celling.

Name: Milzeh
Pos_Review: Self check in service was good especially after coming into Ho Chi Minh on a late delayed flight from Australia.
Neg_Review: Cables were hanging from the ceiling in the room. Dead plant. Hard Mattress. Did not look like photos provided.

Name: Pia
Neg_Review: Sadly the bathroom could not really be called as such. It was terrible humid and dark. The smell of mould spread across the whole room. I preferred not to take a shower.

Name: Anne
Pos_Review: This was my first solo trip abroad, so I was very keen on selecting the hotel I stayed at. I chose this place because itâ€™s very accessible, with food establishments and tourist destinations within walking distance. Nang, the staff member, was very helpful and catered to all my requests. She even installed a new TV when she learned that the one in my room was broken. The room was spacious, very clean, and the bed was so comfy that I had to force myself to leave my room at some point. ğŸ˜… Also, the price is super affordable.

Name: Marija
Pos_Review: Beautiful room and amazing host. She helped us with everything even not meeting us. Highly recommend this place. Only the music was at the near by place, but if you close the window it will help.

Name: Jj
Neg_Review: The music in the bar next door is very loud and vibrating

Name: Shayne
Pos_Review: Convenience.
Neg_Review: Nothing.

Name: Daimi
Pos_Review: Amazing place near the center, very clean, host very nice and accommodating, I can only recommend !

Name: Elisa
Pos_Review:
Clean room. The cleaner kept the rooms very clean .
Near shopping malls 
Near bus stations
Neg_Review: I booked an apartment type but no kitchen stuffs like plates and utensils. just a water heater. They dont have a weighing scale too that most of the hotels should provide, even a handy one.it is important for every guests, when they are about to leave and fly back.

Name: Michal
Pos_Review: Location. Staff. Price.
Neg_Review: EDM club next to the hotel.)) no sleep

Pos_Review:
Great place! Zoey the receptionist was very helpful!

Neg_Review:
Bathroom floor was a bit dirty (especially the flooding)

Name: Oliwia
Pos_Review: Great location, available staff and cute and clean room. All good I recommend:)

Name: Taisia
Pos_Review: an average place to spend a couple of nights if you want to explore the city. The host was very helpful throw the messages and check in was very easy. the hotel seems safe.
Neg_Review:
-smell of mold 
-something was leaking in the shower, so the floor there was always wet
-unpleasant beddings and sheets, very synthetics. not comfortable 
-all night it was party outside, in the street. very hard to sleep even with earplugs. I guess its everywhere in the city center

Name: Tom
Pos_Review: Great AC. Bed was comfortable and spacious. Nice to have a good fridge too. Was good for the price.
Neg_Review: Really loud night club next door so bring some earplugs. Bit of an ant problem in room we had to clean up upon arriving too.

Name: Kim
Pos_Review: This hotel was the perfect getaway for my trip! The friendly staff and charming decor made my stay special. Itâ€™s conveniently located near all the major attractions, so I was able to make the most of my visit. Highly recommend!

Name: Nina
Pos_Review: This hotel was a great choice for my trip! The room was spotless, and the staff were friendly. Itâ€™s located near many attractions and lively clubs, perfect for a night out. Just keep in mind that itâ€™s all stairs, but I didnâ€™t mind at all!

Name: Annabelle
Pos_Review: Great location, very friendly host. She was very accommodating! Would stay again.

Name: Matias
Pos_Review: The staff
Neg_Review:

Not worthy

Name: Jeremy
Pos_Review: Ben Thanh Inn is a cozy hotel with 2 rooms per floor. The check-in process at the front desk was easy and payment can be made with card or cash. The hotel is tucked away in an alley and it is a 5-10 minute walk to the famous landmarks in Saigon such as the Opera House, Nguyen Hue walking street, and Ben Thanh Market. The rooms themselves are spacious and clean with comfortable mattresses and great air conditioning. Free strong wifi is provided and I had no issues with connectivity.

Name: Meghna
Pos_Review: The location is good as it is closer to all the sites in the city.
Neg_Review: The room felt dingy, it wasn't clean. Their were cockroaches around and we had an instance where someone knocked at the window from the back alley.  Although it is a self check in and Chek out concept, I still believe there are safety concerns and no staff is readily available at the property, not a single person.

Name: Jerzy
Pos_Review: Very comfortable, spotlessly clean, great location and exceptionally helpful receptionist Zoey who got in touch with me before my arrival and was always there to answer my questions. I've travelled in South-East Asia for 1,5 months and this was in top 5 of my best stays! Thank you!
Neg_Review: Everything was great

Pos_Review: The Wi-Fi was fast and reliable  and the staff were very friendly.

Toilets were dirty from the previous guess

Pos_Review: Sáº¡ch sáº½, tiá»‡n nghi, thoáº£i mÃ¡i, vá»‹ trÃ­ trung tÃ¢m

Name: Loan
Pos_Review: Gáº§n trung tÃ¢m , giÃ¡ há»£p lÃ½, phÃ²ng sáº¡ch sáº½

Name: Åawicka
Pos_Review: Perfect location, friendly staff, working ac!
Neg_Review: There was no window- as described

Name: Arcadia
Pos_Review: The apartment was in such a good location and very comfy! The shower was great and the bed also! Fab aircon and also a fan which was nice with the heat! The balcony is very cute unfortunately i visited in the summer so couldnâ€™t stay outside for long. The staff were also lovely, Highly recommend

Name: Francesca
Pos_Review: Recommended accommodation in district 1, quiet and spacious. Water not very hot in the morning.

Name: Dino
Pos_Review: Easy on-line communication, as we didnâ€™t even meet the owners during our short 1N stay
Neg_Review: Itâ€™s a bit confusing to find the first time, as you have to pass a very narrow and dark alley

Name: Regan
Pos_Review:
Staff were friendly and helpful - they allowed us to drop our luggage off earlier before check in which we so appreciated! Room was clean and comfortable - even better than it looked in the photos, location walking distance to shops, markets, the war museum, and to tour operators too. No noise from outside or neighbours which was nice too. 
Do note there are no drinks stocked in the room fridges, we got used to having them available at every other stay and so missed them here because we kept forgetting to buy when we were out.

Name: Yanan
Pos_Review: Good location, close to everywhere. Room was really cosy, feel like home, had everything we needed including fridge and hair dryer. Can store luggage after check out.
Neg_Review: Itâ€™s at a very tricky location, not on main street and grab wonâ€™t send you there. It would be good if host can make a little instruction on how to find the building. Just fyi to people who want to stay, locate The Bistro restaurant on Pastuer, when facing the restaurant, turn into the very tiny small lane on the right hand, and keep going then youâ€™ll see it. No bottle water in the room but you can find convenient stores nearby.

Name: Jere
Pos_Review: In short, it is a good place to stay while in Saigon. The location of the property is really good for visiting sights and doing "touristy" stuff. It is also located on a cozy little alley so you won't hear the traffic at all as the buildings around it block all the noise. The room was also very clean and bathroom had nice fixtures and hot water at good pressure. Customer service is also very good. The couple times when I had problems (mainly with the lock), I used Whatsapp to contact the owner directly and got help every time super quickly. I also liked that there is a balcony and a large fridge/freezer combo.
Neg_Review: The front door lock is too easy to use incorrectly and I (and couple other visitors) were quite frustrated with it. Secondly, there was no bottled water in the room (Saigon tap water is not safe to drink). It is easy to use Grab to have water delivered to you in bulk but there really should be some for the first day/night at the minimum, especially when it costs basically nothing. I also think that the mattress is way too cheap and stiff and should be upgraded.

Name: Marie
Pos_Review: Everything
Neg_Review: Toilet seat was falling off and toilet brush could be provided, but we didnâ€™t find this as a huge problem.

Name: Eva
Pos_Review:
This was our second stay here. Superb location, comfortable and impeccably clean room.
Host is quick to respond to messages as well.
Hot water sometimes not as hot as hot as we'd like but we were stil able to take a shower.

Name: Natarajan
Pos_Review: Excellent location.  Easy to get to the main attractions.  Lots of restaurants nearby.  Good number of spas nearby.
Neg_Review: What could be better - a little bit of discomfort with respect to communication with the owner of the place as there was really no one on site.  Lack of fresh towels -- I guess this is just to make the place better given its outstanding location.  The digital locks were to put it politely, a little temperamental. No fresh water etc.. These are little quibbles but some more effort into thinking from the perspective of a guest will make this place outstanding.

Name: John
Pos_Review: Fun location tucked behind the Rex Hotel in a hem, Rusty Compass cafe in same alley, a favorite.  This is tourist zone and a historic center.
Neg_Review: There is no desk, you communicate via email or phone or whatâ€™s app.  Front door coded entrance is very glitchy and should be replaced.  Write down or take pic of the elaborate info they will send you.  Balcony door has a lock handle unique to VN.  You will think you canâ€™t lock it but you can with their explanation.  The good news is the staff whom you will never meet in person are responsive and competent via your phone apps.

Name: Luke
Pos_Review: Comfortable bed, great location and helpful staff.
Neg_Review: Air con wasnt very good, you get a fan which does a good job to keep you cool while sleeping.

Name: Cal
Pos_Review: Fantastic location. Good communication. Comfy and clean. Quiet. Good shower. Great spot!
Neg_Review: Can't really fault anything

Name: Renata
Pos_Review: Calm accomodation in hidden street. Towels were available and other (shower gel, shampoo).
Neg_Review: Very low signal od WiFi - we tried to connect other WiFi , but it was low too. WiFi itâ€™s important to me, because you need plan your trips, so we cannot . It was so disappointing.

Name: Rainer
Pos_Review:
Right next to one of the best Pho restaurants I ever been to in Vietnam. 
Price for Value is a 10/10
Neg_Review: Unfortunately some constructions just started the day we arrived and the cafe was closed. No window in the room

Name: Linda
Pos_Review:
Stayed for two nights. I was offered a small discount to switch to a room on the 1st floor, which had no windows. The room felt more worn compared to the first one I stayed in and lacked power outlets in essential spots. It was not cleaned daily, which was a drawback but manageable for a short stay.

That said, the property still provided the basics: a comfortable bed, efficient air conditioning, and a peaceful atmosphere for rest. Centrally located in District 1 yet tucked away in a quiet alley, itâ€™s a convenient spot for exploring the area. While unstaffed on-site, the host was always available via WhatsAppâ€”very flexible and accommodating, even allowing luggage storage until the airport pick-up.

Name: Linda
Pos_Review: Stayed for one night. The room provided all the essentials: a comfortable bed, a reasonably clean space, efficient air conditioning, and a peaceful atmosphere for a good night's rest. Centrally located in District 1 yet tucked away in a quiet alley, the room was on the second floor at the back of the building. Although the windows were positioned high on the wall, the room remained bright enough and offered added privacy. While the property is unstaffed on-site, the host was always available via WhatsAppâ€”very flexible and accommodating, even allowing us to store our luggage inside until check-in at 14:00

Name: Donald
Pos_Review: Staff, particularly Hanh, super! Situated near Saigon Center and many pubs and cafes in Dist. 1. But don't expect your taxi driver to find it. Located off the beaten path in an alleyway. Once you get inside thought, the rooms are nice and the price terrific. Bed was perfect! And if you like to get away from the city noises when in the city, this is the best you could get.
Neg_Review: Unfortunately, my room had very high small windows that looked out to an ugly old apt building. Although there was some kind of blinds, it couldn't be adjusted and always gave me the feeling of someone easily looking in from across the way. Also, the TV wasn't working, but I'm sure if I told the manager they would have reacted swiftly.

Name: Ioanna
Pos_Review: Very good location and flexible hours for check in. Very good communication

Name: Pubordee
Pos_Review: Location, Peaceful
Neg_Review: Personal preference to have drinking water provided in room

Name: Hong
Pos_Review: LalaHouse is a serene haven amidst the chaos of the city

Name: Han
Pos_Review: Peaceful surroundings, comfortable accommodations made my stay very relaxing.

Name: Carlos_lago
Pos_Review:
We really liked our stay, the room looks great and it's really nice to have the laundry service. It's also a very good location, quite central and without much noise.

Maybe the only thing is that there were some ants under the bed and in the bathroom, but it didn't really bother us.

Name: Phillip
Pos_Review: Location

Name: Deborah
Pos_Review: Location was fantastic. Not far to walk to the sights

Name: Sandra
Pos_Review:
It was good value, small and cute, exactly what I needed for a two night stay. 
Hanh was extremely responsive both before and during my stay. When I had a minor concern at the start of my stay, Hanh dealt with it immediately and got it resolved in a matter of minutes. 
The proximity to the famous market is walking distance (turn right, right again and 7 minutes walk). 
Lots of great places to eat, coffee shops and local food. 
The apartment building is very modern and extremely clean and the entry systems are very technological and secure. This apartment was just what I needed for a short stay.
Neg_Review:
Not much at all. 
Property was very clean, just need to clean down the side of the bed near the wall. When my EarPods fell down there, it was not good to see.

Name: Huy
Pos_Review: I was expecting a real breakfast.
Neg_Review: Remove the breakfast option if you cannot provide it correctly

Name: Eva
Pos_Review:
We loved our stay at Lala House. Right in the city centre with most everything in walking distance (and for anything further away Grab is cheap enough). It is down a tiny alley so small we barely even noticed it the first time we arrived so we spent a good 5-10 mins looking for it but it was part of the fun :) The room itself was spacious, the bed is one of the most comfortable we've ever slept in and it was big as well. AC placement is brilliant, close to the bed but it wasn't blowing right onto our heads. The bathroom was also a good size with good amenities. The host was really friendly and helpful, quick to respond on WhatsApp if we had a question.
This was a great find and we were really happy to stay here.

Name: Kris
Pos_Review: Kitchen facilities were great. The room was clean, laundry was often and included in the price, and they often asked if I wanted the room cleaned by WhatsApp. There is internet hotspots on every floor and a cafe downstairs that was great. The place is in a great location too. There's a restaurant called Hmm. nearby. Despite the silly name we went 3 times.
Neg_Review: I bruised my knee sitting on the toilet as the wall was so close! Unfortunately I think I booked the only room without a window to the outside. I wished there was a lamp or some other soft lighting for the middle of the night.

Name: Rapine
Pos_Review: The location is perfect, in a calm small street just in the center of the busy pasteur street. The market and Nguyen street are less than 10 minutes away by walking.

Name: Ian
Pos_Review: Located in a clean safe quaint alley just off a main street. Excellent breakfast to be had in neighbouring noodle shop.
Neg_Review: Trouble locking door to balcony.. but otherwise an excellent choice for a quiet private stay.

Name: Ella
Pos_Review: Good value for money & is a walkable distance to the main tourist spots. Communication with owner via WhatsApp was great and offered a free washing service which came in handy
Neg_Review: We arrive a

Name: Tsvetin
Pos_Review: Perfectly located within reach of everything in District 1. Quiet room despite being so central. The owner was responsive when we had queries even late at night. Free laundry service when you stay two nights and returned early the following morning. This saved us after a busy two weeks of travel.
Neg_Review: Check in was a little troublesome as the door code did not work. The owner was however very helpful and created a new code. Still not very quick to get into the room. A little difficult to find as entry was in a back Alley. This also makes Grab pickups more challenging. Room was a little on the small side though appropriate for price. Finally there was a half drank evian bottle in the fridge when we arrived.

Name: Yuichi
Pos_Review: Location, cleanness, kindness, and cute cat.
Neg_Review: Difficult to understand how to use smart door.

Name: Michaela
Pos_Review:
Apartment is located in narrow street ( so there are no cars and is more quite ), in basement is s cofee shop and most important, is located close to the Opera House, Central Post Office, Independent Palace, Bitexo Tower ( all in walking distance ). Near is a lot of restaurants, 7 eleven is 6 minutes of walk, Cirkle K on the opossite side also cca 6 minutes.
We had apartment with balcony ( is small but is enough ), but only with one chair, room is smaller but OK, bed is king size.
Neg_Review:
The owner allow us late check out ( 6 hours ) but for the price almost like for 1 extra day in spite of fact, we pay for first night and came next day at 11 a.m. We appriciate late check out but the price was a little bit high. 
There is only  one trash bin in the room, in bathroom, there is no daily cleaning the room, so maybe is good idea to let spare bags in the room.

Name: Leah
Pos_Review: The hostess was wonderful and very responsive and quick with replies. I never really had to wait for an answer from her and she was very accommodating. The room itself had a little more wear than the photos show but overall it was very clean and smelled good which i think are the two most important things. The bed was also honestly a lot comfier than some of the other beds i stayed on so far and the sheets were very clean. The only negative i have to say is that there was a huge cockroach in my room but that wasnâ€™t the fault of the hostess or anyone what cleaned and i was able to quickly get rid of it. The location is a little father then the main backpacking section of the district, but the value of the room and the security that i felt being there made up for it.

Name: Elizabeth
Pos_Review: Good location, quiet with coffee shop downstairs. Easy online check in. Host very quick to respond.
Neg_Review: No hot water and one night there was no water at all, but the problem was resolved within a couple hours. Nicer in photos than in reality.

Name: Oliver
Pos_Review: The manager was very helpful and responded positively to my requests. The room was like new with quality fittings. The location is brilliant yet shielded from the noise of the city centre.

Name: Zebiko
Pos_Review:
Clean, comfortable room.
Free laundry with a minimum nights stay.
Great location, within walking distance to most important sites, restaurants, and comercial areas.
Friendly host.

Name: James
Pos_Review: Brilliant location, very comfortable bed, nice coffee shop
Neg_Review: Only problem was smell from drains in bathroom and some mosquito in room when arrived. After shutting window problem solved!

Name: Jason
Pos_Review: The property was nice. Clean and good location.
Neg_Review: Water pressure was not great but unfortunately the  city were doing maintenance on the water mains at the time. So it wasnâ€™t the hotel owners fault.

Name: ChloÃ©
Pos_Review: Super well located, good value for money and room nicely decorated.
Neg_Review: Our sheets were really dirty when we arrived but the hostess was really comprehensive and came to change them.

Name: Hisae
Pos_Review: Location is good, the staff was so helpful to teach me how to open the key.
Neg_Review: There were ants in the room.

Name: Miza
Pos_Review: The location is superb, almost everything is 5 minutes walk away from the apartment. I was able to explore the city and enjoy the city walk seamlessly as along the hotel, the roadside is pedestrian friendly. There is laundry available and a pantry to reheat food. The facilities available made the travel so convenient. The room and toilet are very hygienic. The owner is very responsive too. I would definitely repeat staying here when visiting Ho Chi Minh again!
Neg_Review: So far all is good

Name: Ha
Pos_Review: Atmostphere, Size room, convenience location
Neg_Review: AC can not be cold. Dont have water dispensary

Name: Adam
Pos_Review: Good location, however hard to find at first, need to step into a narrow corridor among biuldings. I could leave my stuff for a few hours after stay.
Neg_Review: Balcony useless, as it goes directly to neighbour's building. Very hard bed.

Name: Maria
Pos_Review: Itâ€™s location very strategic, youâ€™re at the center of District 1 yet itâ€™s quiet.

Name: Maria
Pos_Review: Location
Neg_Review: Everything else

Name: Rodrigo
Pos_Review:
LaLa House is a fantastic place to stay in Ho Chi Minh City. The location is excellentâ€”just a short walk from two well-stocked shopping malls, where youâ€™ll find everything you need, including a supermarket just 5 minutes away. Public transportation is easily accessible, making it convenient to explore the city.

The apartment itself is well-equipped, and in a city as hot as Ho Chi Minh, a fully functional air conditioning unit is absolutely essentialâ€”and thankfully, it works perfectly. Thereâ€™s also a shared kitchen, which is great if you prefer to prepare your own meals.

For food lovers, the area is full of options. You can try authentic Vietnamese street food right nearby, and thereâ€™s even a healthy food restaurant just next door. If youâ€™re looking for nightlife, Bui Vien Street is only a 15-minute walk away.

On top of that, the host is excellentâ€”she made our self-check-in process smooth and was very helpful. Weâ€™re planning to stay here for about three months, and honestly, we see no reason to look for another place. Highly recommended!
Neg_Review: Everything was fine.

Name: Jakob
Pos_Review:
Exactly as described, the flat is very clean and located perfectly in district 1 right next to the opera house.
The AC is working flawlessly and the self check in was very easy to do.

Name: Kevin
Pos_Review: The room was really tiny and no reception, it is a auto-checking! Beside this really good situated
Neg_Review: Very tiny place

Name: Lori
Pos_Review: This is a great spot. The location is excellent being down a quiet alley but right in the heart of the city. The room is clean and has everything we needed. The hosts were very helpful.

Name: Paula
Pos_Review: The room was very clean and staff was very helpful. Location was amazing.So much is walking distance. I felt very safe, as there is a keypad entrance code in the lobby and at your hotel room door . Great place for the price

Name: Aliffi
Pos_Review: The rooms at LALAhouse Spring Apartment were clean, spacious, and well-designed. We appreciated the ample space for packing and unpacking, which made our stay more comfortable.  The location of LALAhouse Spring Apartment was ideal, right in the heart of Saigon Center. It offered easy access to local attractions, dining, and shopping, making it a great choice for those looking to explore the city.
Neg_Review: One thing to note was that the lobby area was undergoing renovations during our stay, which made the entrance feel less inviting than expected. However, once we got past the first floor, the experience improved significantly. Despite not having windows, the room was cozy and had a pleasant atmosphere.

Name: Philip
Pos_Review: Location was good
Neg_Review: Cold shower and bed was hard and construction in lobby

Name: Micky
Pos_Review: Location.
Neg_Review:
Prison cell. No windows. No bedside lights. Old bedlinen smelled musty, not a clean smell. No rubbish bin. Tiny bathroom, cold water sometimes  particularly in morning. Wi fi no signal.
A taxi from the airport, ordered by the property cost us 550 vnd, about 20 euro, paid in cash to the property. We organised a really good return taxi, cost 120 vnd, about 6 euro. Perhaps it might be better to organise your own taxi?
Two bed deluxe studio? Terrible!

Name: Collin
Pos_Review: The facilities are top-notch, and the staff is very accommodating

Name: Emma
Pos_Review: The location was great. The little cafe downstairs was convenient to work in and get a morning coffee/drink and you get 10% off for staying on site. Air con good and large tv!
Neg_Review: We didnâ€™t have a good overall experience tbh. We were checked into the wrong room, and all communication is done via WhatsApp. So we were back and forward with the manager, we then got moved to a different room which also wasnâ€™t the same as the one we booked and it also wasnâ€™t clean yet, we walked into a dirty room. She said the one we booked had guests in so itâ€™s not possible to have that one but this one is the same.. I explained that she needs to ensure there are pictures of both rooms that are classed as deluxe doubles on booking.com to avoid disappointment. We had to pay in cash but they didnâ€™t have change and we had to wait until the next day for change. The bed isnâ€™t comfortable for me and I woke up with a sore back and had restless sleeps. The windows of the rooms look onto the corridor which has automatic lights with movement so we were bothered by the light from neighbours coming in and out. I ended up asking for a discount as we hadnâ€™t received our change back yet and she agreed on 100k which equates to around Â£3 but she wanted to cancel the full booking on booking.com and then book directly with her and we just thought it was more hassle than it was worth so we ended up just saying to leave it. Once I got the change back it was 99k short but I was over it by that point.

Name: Ahn
Pos_Review: The rooms are spotless and well-organized, making for a very pleasant stay.

Name: Schnieder
Pos_Review: Impeccable cleanliness

Name: Sara
Pos_Review: Lalahouse - A modern sanctuary

Name: Mika
Pos_Review: Lala is a hidden oasis in the city

Name: Anna
Pos_Review: The contemporary design and excellent amenities

Name: Carol
Pos_Review: The calm atmosphere and great service made my stay so enjoyable.

Name: Donald
Pos_Review: The overall ambiance is very welcoming. I highly rcm this place.

Name: Shirlene
Pos_Review: The peaceful atmosphere and excellent service provided a much-needed break from my hectic routine.

Name: Angela
Pos_Review: Modern amenities and friendly staffs made my stay very comfortable

Name: Terry
Pos_Review: Wonderful experience

Name: Samara
Pos_Review: he location is convenient, and the facilities are top-notch. I had a relaxing and enjoyable stay.

Name: Ami
Pos_Review: From the moment I arrived, the staff made sure I felt comfortable. The rooms are well-maintained and cozy.

Name: Mina
Pos_Review: The serene environment and excellent amenities made my stay incredibly pleasant.

Name: Kim
Pos_Review: Opulent rooms, top-notch service, and elegant ambiance. It's a treat for anyone seeking a luxurious stay.

Name: Alice
Pos_Review: Room itâ€™s clean and location is very convenient, itâ€™s in the center and is easy to walk around
Neg_Review:
The bathroom was quite small, I had to sit on the side of the wc because knees didnâ€™t fit otherwise.
If you need to storage your luggages because maybe you go for few days on a tour and then you go back, thatâ€™s not possible, there isnâ€™t any room where to lock your belongings and in Ho Chi Minh City is not possible to find a place where to storage your stuff. In that case i suggest to book a hotel that is able to provide this service. You can leave your luggages in a corner for few hours.

Name: Alice
Pos_Review:
Location is very good, it is in the center, easy to walk around.
The room itâ€™s clean
Neg_Review:
The toilet of the room was very small, itâ€™s not possible to sit on the wc properly because knees donâ€™t fit, so you have to sit on the side.
If you have a tour of few days and you want to leave your luggages there, thatâ€™s impossible, there isnâ€™t any room to leave and lock your luggage (just a corner for few hours) and in Ho Chi Minh you wonâ€™t find a place to storage your luggage, so in case you are planning to do that I recommend an hotel which for sure will provide this service

Name: David
Pos_Review: The staff is very helpful, ensuring a comfortable stay.

Name: Alexander
Pos_Review: Lala combines traditional architecture with modern amenities. The unique decor adds to the charm of this place.

Name: Vincent
Pos_Review: LalaHouse serves the most delicious local and international cuisine. It's a must-visit for all food enthusiasts

Name: Han
Pos_Review: This house offers a serene escape from the hustle and bustle of the city. The tranquil ambiance and soothing decor make it the perfect place to relax and unwind.

Name: Vivian
Pos_Review: LalaHouse provides a tranquil escape in the heart of the city. The serene ambiance and the calming decor of the rooms make it a perfect place for relaxation

Name: Jamaica
Pos_Review: LalaHouse offers a homely atmosphere with great amenities. A perfect place for a city rest

Name: Soh
Pos_Review:
Five stars âœ¨ 

Only Breakfast was poor.
Neg_Review: Basic breakfast should be provided including tea and coffee milk etc

Name: Timothee
Pos_Review: I absolutely love the atmosphere at LalaHouse, which gives me the feeling of being in my own home. The rooms are spacious, clean, and fully equipped. The staff here are very friendly and always ready to assist. I also love the location of the hotel, which is convenient for traveling to famous tourist spots. I will definitely choose LalaHouse for my next vacation

Name: Julie
Pos_Review: Good & clean room. Amazing and super friendly staff!
Neg_Review: Room is not fully dark in the morning.

Name: Jen
Pos_Review: Great location. Self check in was easy. Good communication, in English, from owner before arrival. Cute decorations in room. Room 202 can be totally blacked out for a good night sleep.
Neg_Review: Television and internet did not work in Room 203 and Room 202 smelled of cigarette. Both rooms tiny, have to squeeze past fridge to get to bathroom in Room 203 and if on toilet in 202 your knees hit the wall! To get to the property you need to walk down an alleyway and walk through a cafe. There were no bedside lights in Room 202. Beds were very firm. Owner constantly contacting me to find out when we were checking out - felt pressured to leave early. I informed regarding smell of room but had to buy a spray myself to make it smell better. Showers cold in both rooms.

Name: Paul
Pos_Review: I absolutely love the atmosphere at LalaHouse, which gives me the feeling of being in my own home. The rooms are spacious, clean, and fully equipped. The staff here are very friendly and always ready to assist. I also love the location of the hotel, which is convenient for traveling to famous tourist spots. I will definitely choose LalaHouse for my next vacation

Name: Hailey
Pos_Review: I feel extremely fortunate to have found LalaHouse during my long business trip. The atmosphere here is incredibly homely and comfortable, making me feel as if I was in my own house. The rooms are fully equipped, clean, and very quiet, allowing me to focus on my work without any distractions. The staff here are very friendly and always ready to assist. I am genuinely satisfied with my experience here and will definitely return to LalaHouse for my future business trips

Name: Mark
Pos_Review: Despite being right in the heart of district one, it was blissfully quiet.   Room had everything you need and was very clean.

Name: Benjamin
Pos_Review: Very great. Its the second time I visited hcm and this is the fourth hotel Ive stayed into. The place was really great and cozy. Ive had everything I need, and its very quiet place. One of the hotels Ive stayed before has a small bathroom, the other one has a strong rusty water in the shower and tap. This is one of my favorite now.

Name: Wenxuan
Pos_Review: Clean,Comfortable,Good Location

Name: Alexandra
Pos_Review: Central position but hidden from the nosy central streets
Neg_Review: Noise from the other rooms and the sound of the elevator could be heard directly from the room

Name: Firemansasha
Neg_Review: dirty bed sheet smelled of last persons stay location not easy to find as its in alley n no sign board out side to entrance its home stay operated by whatts app so u must have wifi connection to communicate other wise no chamce to enter room had no natural lights or opened to air pic on website of room with door window is not real room i got

Name: Neil
Pos_Review: The property really surprised me at how great it was at the low cost. Clean, great size, very central to a nice area and a greta price. I would stay there longer next time knowing what I do now. Love the coffee shop itâ€™s attached to as well.

Name: Razif
Pos_Review: Cozy apartment, comfort and clean
Neg_Review: The pillow is too thin

Name: Amy
Pos_Review: Location
Neg_Review: The room was infested with ants

Name: ThÃºy
Pos_Review: Convenient, comfy and quiet.
Neg_Review: Too many advantages for planning the trip.

Name: Kate
Pos_Review: Location was amazing! Walking distance to main sights, loads of restaurants, shopping, bars, and cafes. The room was very quite considering it's in the middle of Ho Chi Minh. I had a very comfy sleep - firm mattress was great!! There is also a resident cat called Lucky - very cute and friendly! Lala the owner was extremely friendly too. Thank you for booking me an extra three nights last minute. If I'm back in Ho Chi Minh in the future I will stay again. :)

Name: Daniel
Pos_Review: Close to sights. Nice staff in the Cafe
Neg_Review: Very small, old and outdated facilities

Name: Rebecca
Pos_Review: The location was great! If you only want to sleep in your hotel room this is a good place to stay.
Neg_Review: When I checked in, there were still old empty bottles and shampoo sachets from the previous guest, which signalled the room hadn't been cleaned! They also have a cat that has a bell that moves around a lot in the night, which is cute, but not great if you are a light sleeper.

Name: Marta
Pos_Review: They allowed us to check in early being super jet lagged. Location was great too.

Name: Melanie
Pos_Review: Quiet , central location
