Name: Samara
Pos_Review: Itâ€™s very well located, everything was brand new, the staff was very friendly and the breakfast was in another building but it was delicious. I really recommend it.

Name: Katie
Pos_Review:
Beds were super comfortable
Nice bathroom, huge shower
Location
TV with Netflix
We were never disturbed by any noise
Neg_Review:
No complaints about the room
Strange smell in the communal area
The staff we encountered were not very friendly

Name: Louise
Pos_Review: Very good clean hotel in a central location, very helpful staff.

Name: Kirsten
Pos_Review: The staff are amazing, the room has great facilities.â€˜itâ€™s really central and convenient for walking everywhere. The hotel decor and reception area is really nice and welcoming
Neg_Review:
I would have given this a perfect score if I hadnâ€™t of been in a street-front room on level 2.  Firstly, the noise of the traffic continues day and night and the room is loud. So I purchased a noise machine to try and cover up the noise. This did nothing!. Secondly, nearly every night a group of men smoke just outside the hotel awning, which of course goes up into the front facing rooms.
Even with all windows shut, my room was full of a cigarette smell. I barely slept for my whole visit. I was so tired that I wandered around HCMC like a zombie as I couldnâ€™t even think correctly.

Name: Odede
Pos_Review: Location was great, lots of cafes and restaurants nearby. Breakfast was hearty and staff were very pleasant. All plug types were available.
Neg_Review: Space was a bit small but really nice. Really good value for money for that price.

Name: Nick
Pos_Review:
Very clean and modern rooms, including the property itself. Itâ€™s not a big hotel, but the staff are all lovely and it is in a great location.

The breakfast was simple, yet more than enough and fresh. I highly recommend staying here

Name: Ahmad
Pos_Review: The room was excellent and comfortable, and the staff were nice and helpful. The only problem i have with the room is that mine is at the 8th floor, but the elevator only goes up to the 7th floor.

Name: Martin7705
Pos_Review: The bed and pillow ia pretty comfortable. The location is good, close to Ben Thanh market and lots of resto and cafe around the hotel.
Neg_Review: Nothing

Name: Vishnu
Pos_Review: The hotel is centrally placed but very basic. Poor facilities but clean. Excellent for the price and alll that I required.
Neg_Review: Lack of facilities and only offered Vietnamese breakfast in their building next door and no lunch or evening meals.

Name: Amanda
Pos_Review: Central location, good amenities and friendly staff.

Name: Grocock
Pos_Review: Modern and fresh

Name: Sungwar
Pos_Review: breakfast is Very good.
Neg_Review: evrything is good!!!

Name: Annamay
Pos_Review: The location is very central, between grab bikes and walking itâ€™s very simple to reach all the usual tourist attractions. The communication before arriving was great with the staff- any time I have a question they were very prompt when answering. They kindly let me leave my bag at the hotel after check out while I explored the city some more. Itâ€™s a great base to explore Ho Chi Minh City! It was great value for money and I felt very safe as a solo female traveller.
Neg_Review:
There is no room service or food services available in this hotel- breakfast comes from the branch next door. 
The rooms with the window out to the hallway (looking at a wall)- can be very dark. Itâ€™s not a problem, just something to be aware of when booking.

Name: Sally
Pos_Review: The location is great, just a 5-10 minute walk to Ben Thanh Markets with plenty of restaurants close by.  The hotel is clean and modern.  The breakfast is nice but basic.  We were upgraded to a bigger room with bigger windows but the view wasn't great (not a big deal).  TV was good with good picture and sound.  Hotel staff were friendly and professional. The shower was hot with good pressure and the bed was comfortable.  The room was a good size.

Name: Joseph
Pos_Review: The staff were so so friendly and welcoming. Really helpful with anything we needed - holding onto our bags or ordering a taxi etc. Additionally the bed was super comfortable and the room generally very nice and well kept.
Neg_Review: Unfortunately, I think this might just be an inevitable with hotels sometimes, we found a bed bug in our bed which obviously dampened the experience a bit. Aside from, nothing bad to say about the hotel, lovely place.

Name: Doan
Pos_Review: Cleaning surface was the best! Hands down! They would even clean long after typical cleaning hours to ensure our room was always clean!
Neg_Review: The shower, althought comfortable and clean had the worst water temperature and pressure. It would be cold most of the time or boiling hot when trying to adjust, but wouldn't last, just mostly cold. And when you finally got it warm, only a little bit of water would come out and it wouldn't last long.

Name: Kiriaki
Pos_Review: Really good location. Room was clean and staff were really helpful.
Neg_Review: Nothing

Name: German
Pos_Review: Very clean
Neg_Review: Breakfast is paid, located in the other partner building

Name: Janna
Pos_Review: The location was only around 10 min walk to Ben Thanh market. Hotel was good value for money. A lot of cafes and convenience stores nearby. Staff was helpful and nice. There was also netflix on the TV.
Neg_Review: The hotel had Poor sound proofing, can hear guest talking outside.

Name: Duyen
Pos_Review: Clean hotel, location was good and staff was helpful.

Name: Natalie
Pos_Review: Very clean and new. However, our room was very dark with a window to the staircase making it feel very gloomy when inside
Neg_Review: Very clean and new. However, our room was very dark with a window to the staircase making it feel very gloomy when inside

Name: Walter
Pos_Review: a great location, modern & attractive design, rooms were clean and comfortable and worth the price
Neg_Review: while booking and checking in there was quite some confusion as there is a twin hotel two doors down!

Name: Monique
Pos_Review: We stayed on the 3 rd floor. The room was facing the main street . We found it was not noisy at all as i think the windows are double glazed . Big floor to ceiling windows which is very nice and bright. The bathroom  was nicely renovated and everything looks new. Breakfast was nice and simple. A very decent spread of hot meals . The bed was comfortable and sheets were very clean. Staff was happy to accommodate us with our requirements. The location was very close to a lot of restaurants and cafes. About 7 mins walk to Ben Thanh Market
Neg_Review: No swimming pool

Name: Abbas
Pos_Review: Friendly staff and a very nice and spacious room in a wonderful location. Room was well equipped and extremely comfortable!
Neg_Review: The breakfast could have been better. Options were quite limited.

Name: Darren
Pos_Review: Nice, modern hotel in a great location. Simple and clean.

Name: Jan
Pos_Review: Great room in a great location. Will happily come back.

Name: Nicola
Pos_Review: Central location and such helpful and friendly staff and a pool table
Neg_Review: No food in our property but perhaps the one next door

Name: Lucie
Neg_Review: The door to the bathroom did not close.

Name: Carlee
Pos_Review:
Good location - given the price it was walkable to the main district 1 sites (there are hotels closer to the action but they are more expensive).
Comfortable bed and good shower. 
Front desk staff were friendly and helpful.
Neg_Review:
Noisy from street noise (even in the seventh floor) but thatâ€™s to be expected.
Breakfast was the low point. We had had good breakfasts in all our other Vietnam hotels so had similar expectations but this was disappointing - so much so that we didnâ€™t bother with our included breakfast after the first day. The coffee was the first undrinkable coffee we had anywhere in Vietnam, I think the butter might have been off, the only juice was not actually fresh juice but orange squash/cordial that had to be diluted, noodles were dry, the lady at the omelette station was super grumpy, the only spread on offer was pineapple jam :-( Such a shame after such great breakfasts at other similar quality hotels. Maybe if this was our first hotel instead of our last we wouldnâ€™t have had such high expectations.

Name: Ashley
Pos_Review: location is so great, staff are friendly that make me feel like stay in a 5 star hotel. The onwer also run a massage so guest could have discount.

Name: Roots
Pos_Review: Great location, super comfortable beds, good AC and quiet.
Neg_Review: No natural light and rooms quite basic / dark.

Name: Robert
Pos_Review: Super friendly and helpful staff. Clean and modern rooms. Good central location.
Neg_Review: Room doesn't have a dresser.

Name: Sharon
Pos_Review: Good location at reasonable price.  Very helpful staff.
Neg_Review: Location was great.

Name: Bruyere
Pos_Review: Very good emplacement the staff is very nice

Name: Vicki
Pos_Review: The staff at this hotel were extremely friendly and happy to help. The room was clean and big. The location is good, next door to Saigon Square and Ben Thanh market. Good wontons next door to the hotel!

Name: Phillip
Pos_Review:
in central location to most places I wanted to go
Close to good breakfast options
Neg_Review: no pool

Name: Mh
Pos_Review:
Value for money.
Good location, near Ben Thanh Market.

Name: Claude
Pos_Review: Friendly staff, clean, purpose-oriented modern interior. Reasonably good location. Everybody can find something that will fit at the breakfast buffet but it is relatively simple.
Neg_Review: Not applicable.

Name: Fabrice
Pos_Review: Great place with a central location.
Neg_Review: The gym is a micro space behind a screen/curtain which is a bit weird but functional.

Name: Dustin
Pos_Review: Very satisfied overall. Great location which made getting around easy. Hotel was very clean. Staff were great, very friendly and accommodating. Hotel was great value for money. Breakfast was great even though food variety was limited. Would definitely stay again and recommend to others.
Neg_Review: Everything was great I have no complaints.

Name: Dor
Pos_Review: This is a new hotel, very good location. The room is very big with a big shower. Also, there is a billiard table in the hotel.
Neg_Review: The breakfast was standard. Also the water in the shower was not drained appropriately.

Name: Jaejin90
Pos_Review: Spacious room and bathroom!
Neg_Review: Bugs ruined the hotel a bit for me. The door has a small opening which allows bugs from the hallway to get into the room. My partner got bitten all over by mosquitoes. I've also seen some centipedes crawling in the room.

Name: Karen
Pos_Review:
We had the Enjoyable Above room.
The hotel is in a Fantastic quiet location next to Ben Thanh market, Saigon Square and Central market all within 10 minutes walking distance. 
Hotel has attentive staff and as the hotel looks reasonably new it is still very clean.

Name: Kuo
Pos_Review: The breakfast is very good. The staff is very patient and nice and answer questions. they are really friendly and helpful. This is my 4th time to stay in this hotel and i can feel more and more visitor start to stay in this hotel and from all the other country.
Neg_Review: 2024 OCT 12/13 room 402 çš„éŸ“åœ‹äººå¾ˆåµ åŠå¤œå›ä¾†ä¸€å¤§å †è²éŸ³

Name: Greg
Pos_Review: I liked the location of the property.  I liked the friendly and present staff, who were always willing to help and provide recommendations on what to see and do.  The room was clean, comfortable and more than adequate for what I needed.
Neg_Review: Not Applicable.

Name: Oudin
Pos_Review: Very nice hotel well located easy access by walk to many sites.

Name: Arie
Pos_Review:
Location. 
And nice set up and variety for breakfast.
Neg_Review: Divided into 2 buildings , for breakfast we have to go for other building and our window facing the outdoor staircase.

Name: Martin
Pos_Review: Nice little hotel within easy walking distance to many areas including Taka Mall, Ben Thanh market and more. Rooms are compact but well planned out. Bed is comfortable.
Neg_Review: Shower is difficult to set hot water (temperature changes). Other than that no negative feedback.

Name: Tim
Pos_Review: Location and cleanliness
Neg_Review: Morning

Name: Suri
Pos_Review: excellent location. Very attentive and supportive staff always ready for help. Check in & check out without problems. Reasonable breakfast. Definitely worth  for 1 day stay
Neg_Review: TV doesn't have TV  free TV channels. It could be little confusion about hotel location, because there are actually 2 hotels, I will advice mentioned it in Booking hotel information's.

Name: Igor
Pos_Review: The location is great - close to Walking Street, the market and the Opera building
Neg_Review: One of the rooms that we were given had no window or actually had a window looking into a small shaft (2 x 2 meters) with no sunlight whatsover. They have quite a few rooms of this type although their booking.com site doesn't mention "rooms without windows". When I complained they tried to convince me that there was no misleading on their part, that the rooms had windows, just no view. So be carefull that you don't get this type of room.

Name: Xue
Pos_Review:
it was very near a lot
of shops salons etc 
staff attentive 
breakfast was good
Neg_Review:
there was only one timing that staff would make up my room . 
My window was facing another building :(

Name: Matthew
Pos_Review: Rooms were a great size
Neg_Review: There are a number of hotels with the same name close to each other. I think they are all branches of the same one so be careful with your address

Name: Yanuar
Pos_Review: The location is great! Many great cafes nearby and within walking distance to Ben than market.
Neg_Review: Nothing

Name: Ruth
Pos_Review: The location of the hotel is perfect, close to lots of restaurants and cafes. Room was clean and comfortable.
Neg_Review: The fire alarms went off five times over two nights we stayed there meaning we were awake most of the night, this unfortunately had a negative impact on our stay.

Name: Hj
Pos_Review: It was a good coffee

Name: Hannah
Pos_Review: The comfiest bed and pillows. Ever.

Name: Tow
Pos_Review: Location, lounge deco
Neg_Review: room size, wall and corridor

Name: Geraldine
Pos_Review: Pool table and the room as pictured in listing. Location is 5 mins walk to Ben Thanh market with very little street noises. Comfortable bed.
Neg_Review: Pillows too soft.

Name: Allen
Pos_Review: Very modern and new.
Neg_Review: Could improve the common areas to be more comfortable sitting areas. Breakfast can find improvement with some more options.

Name: Khoi
Pos_Review: good price in center if D1 HCM
Neg_Review: n/a

Name: Anshul
Pos_Review: Location is good . We did not opt for Breakfast .

Name: Qiqi
Pos_Review: Location was good, room looked exactly like the pictures, breakfast was better than expected too (:
Neg_Review: The rooms are quite near each other, and the too floor is only accessible by stairs

Name: Mark
Pos_Review: Great location. Comfy bed. Great staff!

Name: Ringoma
Pos_Review: The selections were not that much but good enough for breakfast.

Name: Lauren
Pos_Review: Room was clean and modern and the location was great - quiet but central to all the tourist spots.
Neg_Review: Room were lacking in character. Staff were very disinterested, not even looking up when we entered the lobby. We had a late fight out of HCM and asked for a late check out on one of the two rooms we booked so we could shower before our flight. Despite having available rooms (hotel was not at capacity), we were told we would have to pay half the room rate for a 4pm check out (a few hours longer than the 12pm normal check out). Disappointing when in all our other stays in Vietnam the staff were a standout.

Name: Kevin
Pos_Review: Clean facilities, great location, and very comfy beds

Name: Jesus
Pos_Review: The location of the hotel was very good. There were many restaurants, cafÃ©s, spas, and shopping malls within walking distance. Bella, the staff at the front desk, was very helpful and accommodating the whole time.
Neg_Review: The hotelâ€™s restaurant where we had our breakfast was in another building although just a few steps away.

Name: Dubravka
Pos_Review:
Very nice hotel positioned, just ten min walking from the several main sightseeing points. Room was large enough with comfortable bed, good airconditioning system and proper bathroom. All was very clean. 
Staff is extremly polite and helpful, especially reception desk team.
Neg_Review: All was good.

Name: Mark
Pos_Review: Great location, easy access to everything I needed to see. I did not need a taxi, I was able to do everything on foot. The staff were excellent.

Name: Patrick
Country: United Arab Emirates (CaÌc TiÃªÌ‰u VÆ°Æ¡ng QuÃ´Ìc AÌ‰ RÃ¢Ì£p ThÃ´Ìng NhÃ¢Ìt)
Pos_Review: So convenient, clean and everything we anticipated
Neg_Review: Perhaps the cleaners could do a more thorough job

Name: Benjamin
Pos_Review:
Modern design, boutique feel.
Central location.
Neg_Review: Breakfast was a bit limited and not as good as other hotels we have stayed in Vietnam.

Name: Veteran
Pos_Review: Location was great with lots of Restaurants nearby, Room was great, Conceirge was great, All staff were great - Cleaning and Breakfast staff.
Neg_Review: The Gym was very small. Breakfast was OK. It was much cheaoper to book direct with the Hotel than via Booking.com

Name: Korrakot
Pos_Review: Location and cleanliness. Staff is super helpful
Neg_Review: The elevator is until 7th floor, if you are allocated on the 8th floor, you have to carry your luggage 1 more further floor.

Name: Juho
Pos_Review: Good location and clean

Name: Korrakot
Pos_Review: Comfy bed, great location.
Neg_Review: None

Name: Tu
Pos_Review: We were able to book rooms for a group of 9 last minute and they did the best they could with putting us together in the one building. They have 2 building that are right next door to each other so it wasnâ€™t a big deal. Our biggest regret was not booking for longer!
Neg_Review: The shower pressure from the rainfall shower head was not the best so had to use the handheld hose. It was a bit of a pain was the holder was not very high. The laundry service is also per piece as opposed to by kg.

Name: Holger
Pos_Review: Location is excellent in the centre of District 1, only a short walk or grab ride from most attractions, and the staff was very helpful
Neg_Review: Triple E Hotel has a policy that does not allow guests to have visitors after 10 pm

Name: Smith
Pos_Review: Location staff rooms
Neg_Review: No Netflix on the tv was very disappointing breakfast was good but limited

Name: William
Pos_Review: Convenient to the Central area for tourists.
Neg_Review: The staff was accomodating enough but not overly friendly as in other stops on our vacation.

Name: Sergei
Pos_Review:
-Room was clean and secure.
-Comfortable bed.
-Good sound insulation.
-Polite stuff.
-In the very middle of city, too overcrowded nearby though.
Neg_Review:
-The breakfast could be more diverse, almost the same and quite limited set of dishes every day. For one or two days its ok, but on the third you cannot already enjoy it.  
-The water pressure in shower could be higher, sometimes temperature of water had being dramatically changing to burning hot for a while.

Name: Nenad
Pos_Review: Location is great,  room is spacious,  clean and comfortable
Neg_Review:
Breakfast area is too small for the 2 Hotel using it, this leads to not enough seating place, people looking for plates, food running out, 20min to get your eggs...

The food itself is good but better organisation would make things much easier but peak hour

Name: Piotr
Pos_Review: Really nice hotel. Good value. For short stay nice.

Name: Philip
Pos_Review: Very pleasant hotel, clean and modern. Good value.  Great staff.

Name: Stephen
Pos_Review: Very cool hotel with all you need for a short stay in HCMC. Well designed and offered a cocktail and coffee bar with great complimentary breakfast.
Neg_Review: Fire exit stairs were left open all night and could hear staff going up and down after midnight. We had to close this door a few times during our stay.

Name: Steven
Pos_Review:
Good location, pretty quiet during night time
Breakfast
Neg_Review:
Bed was very soft
Laundry service a bit pricey

Name: Joy
Pos_Review: Great location and amenities, clean rooms.
Neg_Review: When we were checking out, they claimed multiple of our rooms had towels that were too dirty to clean and demanded we compensate. Most of us were confused as we only used them as usual and were forced to pay 200k for the towels. Our tip for future travellers is to take a photo of your towels in case they produce pictures of towels from other times

Name: Anna
Pos_Review:
The only notable aspect for me was the staff at the lobby/ information.
The elevator was fast, the bed was comfortable and I love the pillows.
Neg_Review:
The location. It's not really at the city center. Going to the real(?) center where the opera house and nice buildings, and shopping malls are located takes several minutes of walking through streets with a lot of people loitering.
Breakfast was forgettable, with the same food served everyday.
The room, altho adequate is not as clean. The real problem is the shower room and toilet that get flooded whenever you take a shower. I don't like tiles that get soaking wet, so I spend several minutes trying to mop and dry the whole area. I also don't see why they put a bathtub that is actually a part of the bedroom, separated only by a curtain!!

Name: Felix
Pos_Review: They promised a quiet room and kept their promise.
Neg_Review: Good location and nice staff.

Name: Stacie
Pos_Review: Property is good.  Clean linen.  Bathroom could be a tab cleaner.  Have windows in my room but no view at all, you see an exterior wall.  Most of the staffs are very nice with one exception, today during breakfast, the noodle lady with glasses.  I asked for a bowl of noodles and quail eggs but she said there is no quail eggs, I looked over and I see some.  She said only one quail egg per bowl which I did not even get one in my bowl.  Then she gave me one.  This is ridiculous.  Made me felt like I have to beg for quail egg. These are no golden eggs either.  For the quality of this hotel and standard, should better train these staff.  I told the front staff what happened and that noodle lady had the audacity to stare at me when I went to get watermelon.  OMG!  I feel so threaten.
Neg_Review: The lady with glasses at the noodle section at breakfast.

Name: Roisin
Pos_Review:
Lovely friendly reception staff.
Comfortable bed and pillows. Clean room.
Good location.
Neg_Review: Other than toast and  eggs for breakfast for us there wasn't any other 'western style' food. Some watermelon and figs..... one morning fresh pineapple, which I spotted in the fridge even though they said there wasn't any! A bit more variety would have been welcome.

Name: Leana
Pos_Review: This was a convenient and good place to stay in district 1.
Neg_Review: Rooms were small.

Name: Alice
Pos_Review: Clean, spacious and comfortable
Neg_Review: No complaints

Name: Rakic
Pos_Review: Beautiful room and great location
Neg_Review: No yoghurt/ fruit for breakkie..Would expect more for this price.

Name: Joanne
Pos_Review: We were given a brand new room at the top of the building so had plenty of space and luxurious large bathroom. The hotel was clean and contemporary with a good choice of breakfasts, located in a quieter street near all the major attractions.
Neg_Review: The gym was pretty small. We couldnâ€™t use the electrical socket next to the bed as water has got into it and smoke came out when we put a plug in. However the staff did try to fix it straight away and promised to get an electrician in the next day (we left so didnâ€™t find out if it got fixed!)

Name: Olive
Pos_Review: Room was absolutely beautiful, exactly how you see it on website. Staff were brilliant and the breakfast was Devine. Rooms were cleaned and restocked everyday
Neg_Review: It was advertised in our room and at breakfast but there was no bar which was a bit of a disappointment. Itâ€™s nice to sit and relax in your hotel and have a drink..

Name: Susan
Pos_Review: We property, very clean with comfortable beds
Neg_Review: Everything was great

Name: Rosemary
Pos_Review: Excellent comfortable small hotel in District 11 in HCMC, very convenient for sightseeing, good breakfast and helpful staff. sorted out a 'Grab' taxi to the airport which was considerably cheaper than the usual cost.
Neg_Review: There are 2 hotels with the same/similar name 'Triple 3' within a few doors of each other on the same street, I tried to get into someone else's room!

Name: Zulaifah
Pos_Review: Very clean and close to Ben tahn market and shops.
Neg_Review: Nothing

Name: Claresta
Pos_Review:
Location is in a quiet area but still within walking distance to Ben Thanh market, although in the less busy side. It is quite convenient for business travellers as it is not too difficult to get a taxi or too much traffic in this area. The hotel was nicely renovated and a surprisingly big room size for Vietnamese standards. Everything was clean and the aircon works very well. Breakfast choices were limited as expected from a smaller boutique hotel but delicious. Do be aware that there are two Triple E Metros that are separated by another shop so be sure of which one you're staying at, so you don't enter the wrong one like I did! 

There is an area outside to sit at to wait for your taxi / delivery comfortably.
Neg_Review: When I checked in, the female receptionist was not very friendly but the rest of the receptionists were much better. I also needed to make urgent changes to my reservation but they were not able to help modify the reservation as I booked through Booking.com instead of directly.

Name: Thao
Pos_Review: Friendly and helpful staff. The welcome drink was so good we were obsessed. Clean and comfortable room with smart tv. Convenient location, cafes anf restaurants nearby. lots of traffic but you donâ€™t hear it much from inside the room. Basic but decent buffet breakfast.
Neg_Review: None

Name: HeikkilÃ¤
Pos_Review: Location, quiet and clean room
Neg_Review: xxx

Name: Lana
Pos_Review: We extended our stay because the staff members (namely, Kent, Tony/Luong and Will/Thanh Luan) left a lasting impression. It was a great experience.

Name: Lana
Pos_Review: The staff were great. Very helpful. Always willing to give recommendations, answer questions and have a chat. In particular, the following three staff members were exceptional and made my stay at Triple E very memorable: Kent, Tony/Luong and Will/Thanh Luan. Would definitely come back.

Name: Mel
Pos_Review: 2nd time staying with Triple E and as usual I really enjoyed my stay. The location is perfect, the staff very helpful. My room was clean and comfortable.
Neg_Review: The soundproofing can be better.

Name: Ang
Pos_Review: Very little selection.

Name: Anna
Pos_Review: Very nice location in a neighborhood with a lot of good restaurants, cafes and bars! Good starting point for exploring the main sights in district 1. Very friendly and helpful staff, and even the most affordable rooms are nice and clean.

Name: Marianne
Pos_Review: Location excellent. Breakfasts were varied and always delicious and fresh with a wide variety of foods. One of the best breakfast in Vietnam.

Name: Lynsey
Pos_Review:
Location - washing machine 
Safe area, great views
Neg_Review: A deep clean would have improved the apartment

Name: Sujay
Pos_Review: Most of the service and facilities was good
Neg_Review: We informed the reception that we are vegetarians when we checked in, though breakfast was included in our rates, very limited options of vegetarian breakfast and the chef/staff at the time of breakfast could not care less.

Name: Seow
Pos_Review: Well managed, every where is clean and tidy. Breakfast buffet spread was really good. Friendly staff and good service.
Neg_Review: Breakfast buffet is served in the next building.

Name: Greg
Pos_Review: The staff. All terrific but Brian was exceptional.
Neg_Review: Fitness centre was tiny. No pool.

Name: Ãvar
Pos_Review: I loved the staff. They were nice and helpful. There was construction outside my room so I woke up early the first day but they changed my room. Then a button fell off my pants and they fixed it for free. They also clean the room late if you want. Even after 21:00.
Neg_Review: The room they gave me first shouldn't be used right now because of extreme noise from 08-16 at least. I stayed for 7 nights and the first 5 were great but I got many bites my last two nights, bed bugs or something.

Name: DÃ©licia
Pos_Review: The bed was very confortable
Neg_Review:
The elevator makes a very loud noise that you can hear from the room. 
The breakfast did not have a lot of options 
The window is an internal one and does not bring any light.

Name: Siobhan
Pos_Review: excellent location. short walk to Ben Than market and opera house and hop on hop off bus etc. Very clean. Room well equipped, modern and very clean. I would definitely stay here again.
Neg_Review: Not many other facilities. Bar in hotel next door (same hotel but building next door) Breakfast basic but fine. breakfasts in general in Vietnam are different to home.

Name: Nathan
Pos_Review: Nice, modern, clean rooms in a good area of Saigon.  Close to walking street and other shopping and restaurants.

Name: Kate
Pos_Review:
The property was very central easy to walk around. The Twin room was clean, modern neutrally decorated the individual beds were larger than single and comfortable.  The room had enough space for 2 person plus large luggage so as not to feel cramped.
Breakfast dining area was sufficient and well decorated
Neg_Review:
Breakfast was adequate but could have done with more fruit.  Also you had to come down early otherwise it would get packed and food items like the minimal fruit slices would not be topped up.
The pictures of the â€œgymâ€ are deceiving. This is in the adjoining building and consists of no more than a tiny area.

Name: Alexander
Pos_Review: The room is not so big but quite comfy. The shower works well, and the bed is just great.
Neg_Review: The breakfast is poor, no sweets or pastry at all but at least they have eggs and omelets.

Name: Kwang
Pos_Review: It is good

Name: Genevieve
Pos_Review: Great location. Very friendly and helpful staff. Very clean. Room was nice and bed was very comfy. Would stay here again.
Neg_Review: Breakfast menu could have more variety.

Name: Deborah
Pos_Review: Fab little hotel.
Neg_Review: Nothing

Name: Vishal
Pos_Review: interior is good
Neg_Review: in room they wer not sweeping floor nice so it was dirty i find that

Name: Dimitri
Pos_Review:
very clean hotel
very professional staff
very well equipped room
very efficient AC
shower with good pressure and hot water
windows with thick curtains 
abundant and good breakfast.
Neg_Review: the breakfast is excellent but there is not much choice availableâ€¦not a big deal thoughâ€¦

Name: Mini
Pos_Review: The central location, close to the shopping area and the sightseeing places . The staff especially Jackie was a marvel for helping us out.
Neg_Review: they were unable to help us with an early check in but that really didnt matter much as we were comng in from Vung Tao and not off an international flight

Name: Ritu
Pos_Review: The location was very central, and the staff super friendly.
Neg_Review: Room size was small. Windows too!

Name: Tony
Pos_Review: Perfect location close to the market. Beautiful room. Great value for money
Neg_Review: Small selection for breakfast but it was perfectly adequate. I just like lots of fresh fruit

Name: Jean
Pos_Review: comfy bed, good air conditioning,lifts,no stairs to entrance .
Neg_Review:
For us it wasnâ€™t in the nicest of areas as it seemed to be mostly bike parts,tyres and homeware little places .We did eat at a couple of restaurants very close by (Hidden House & Di Mai )but not that impressive .
It was easy walk to markets and Saigon centre , but we tended to get grab to most places as it was so hot.
Next time weâ€™d probably go  to a more modern city area hotel.

Name: Parth
Pos_Review:
Staff were nice and helpful 
Clean 
Location is very central to all tourist attractions

Name: Kevin
Pos_Review: The staff are excellent  and they have a good breakfast. The rooms are very modern yet warm. The decor is tastefully done.The bathroom has Toto fixtures and a great shower.
Neg_Review: No complaints about anything. Checked in really late -after midnight anbd it was seamless.

Name: Sabrina
Pos_Review: central

Name: Gerhardno
Pos_Review:
I booked the Hotel as near to my target at District 1.
Receiption was nice as well as the (small) room well arranged, tidy, clean and in a nice design.
Neg_Review: At least I could not reach the breakfast - I slept without dedicatedly alarm until 9:16 on Sunday morning... Referring the rules, breakfast is unfortunately until 9:30, so I did not go down... Breakfast times are not matching to an arrival from Europe- maybe with a longer stay, it's possible to adapt... During the night AC stopped without any visible reason, no autostop set before - had to restart it...

Name: Loke
Pos_Review: Location close to city centre and good food
Neg_Review: Nothing. All good

Name: Itou
Pos_Review: Friendly and supportive staffs. The location is near to the center and easy going. Clean and spacious room with very comfortable bed and pillows.

Name: Erick
Pos_Review: comfortable bed, helpful staff, great location
Neg_Review: there should be more vegetarian/vegan options at breakfast

Name: Hoang
Pos_Review: very nice and clean, good location to nearby attractions
Neg_Review: the shower wasnâ€™t well built with wall protection, it flooded the room every time I showered. Also, was having difficulties booking for a second night with the night staff promising one price and the morning staff saying another price. Ended up just rebooking online for even cheaper.

Name: Osama
Pos_Review: Staff are helpful, location is good, rooms are spacious.
Neg_Review: Slippers shiuld be sanitized since they are reusable

Name: Teneille
Pos_Review: Clean, quiet, great A/C
Neg_Review: further than I thought from main attractions

Name: Midwaymetals
Pos_Review: Great location and I have stayed there before it is clean new and easy to walk to all central city locations
Neg_Review: Nothing

Name: Maria
Pos_Review: Location is very good. The rooms were of good size and comfortable.

Name: L
Pos_Review: everything was good
Neg_Review: a staff member came in the middle of the night at 2am while we were sleeping to check if our hot water was working. we said yes and he left. we reported this to reception in the morning who mentioned that there shouldnâ€™t be any staff disturbing us at that time. odd occurrence.

Name: Kimmei
Pos_Review: Located in a quieter area, yet,most tourist sites, food and convenience stores are within walking distance. Helpful staff, clean and comfortable stay.

Name: Tamara
Pos_Review: Room with window backing into the wall was very quiet

Name: Sarah
Pos_Review: The hotel was perfect for a one night stay before an early morning flight the next day. Was close to the bus station and easy access to airport by taxi. Plenty of restaurants and cafes nearby. The staff were super helpful and nice touch of a free early morning coffee in the reception area. There are currently no breakfast facilities. Would stay again
Neg_Review: Nothing

Name: Nja79
Pos_Review: Great location, friendly staff and great facilities
Neg_Review: nothing!

Name: Rupert
Pos_Review: The hotel is in the city centre, close to the market and some interesting buildings and places. A convenience store and several banks are nearby. The property was new, the rooms tidy and accommodating. Even though the windows are to the street, it was very calm. The windows allow a lot of natural light in the room. At the same time, the curtains are thick enough to block it if needed.
Neg_Review: The gym consists of a couple of dumbells and some endurance  machines.

Name: Bryan
Pos_Review: Brand new hotel. All fittings and furnishings very modern and in excellent condition. Shower great with good pressure, spotlessly clean. Very helpful attentive staff who are always trying to help you out. Gym looked nice, small but new (sadly I didn't use it) Location is close enough to the action but not IN the action - a 10 min walk will do the trick. Near Ben Thanh market .
Neg_Review: Maybe no breakfast? But I knew that when I booked so hardly a problem.

Name: Quan
Pos_Review: Fantastic location and extremely good price for being in the center of the city. The beds were very comfortable.
Neg_Review: Nothing

Name: Jian
Pos_Review:
Good location, walking distance to sightseeings in downtown.
The room is clean, nice & simple docorated.
The price is good comparing to the location. 
The hotel is available for people who is looking for decent boutique hotel in stead of star hotels.

Name: Jian
Pos_Review:
Great location in D1 in HCM city, simple decorated room, clear and clean!
Overall, it's great value if comparing the location, the room, the price.

Name: James
Pos_Review: Nice staff, pretty good location
Neg_Review: I stayed twice, on my way through Saigon going in and then again going out. The hotel has two locations, a few meters from each other. The first stay was at one location, and when I added a second night was given a free upgrade to a large, quiet room with a great view and even a bathtub. Based on that stay, much higher ratings would have been appropriate; however, my return stay was in the other hotel, the room had a putrid odor, and workers started drilling the wall from next-door at 8am. Also, there is no breakfast at either location regardless of the room price. Nice free coffee though.

Name: Penn
Pos_Review:
I like the great hospitality that was provided by the staff there. The lady situated at the concierge tries her best to answer all our enquiries and provided all the help she could.
The staff there are all very friendly and polite. 
The security guard was also very nice and friendly,
They will go an extra mile to take care of elderly and ensuring our safety by asking grab drivers to come right infront of the hotel for us to get on the car. They will also open the door for us to enter and exit the car.
Neg_Review: the room was abit dark and the Colour of the walls donâ€™t give off a clean and pleasant vibes. other than that , all is very good.

Name: Paulene
Pos_Review:
-Room and shower were large
-Bed was comfortable 
-Everything was clean and new  
-Good water pressure in the shower, never ran out of hot water
-Free water and coffee in the room 
-Good location 
-Staff friendly and helpful 
-Aircon kept the room cold
Neg_Review:
- Drainage in the shower could be improved
- Not completely sound proof

Name: Alex
Pos_Review: huge separate shower room and good water pressure on the 7th floor
Neg_Review: a local friend came and visit and he was asked to leave his id document with the front desk! didn't know that is legal!!

Name: Martin
Pos_Review:
The rooms were spacious, clean, extremely modern and water pressure was great!

The staff were one of the highlights. We lost one of our phones on a taxi and the receptionist worked tirelessly to help us trackdown, communicate and organise its retrieval.
Neg_Review: No functioning kitchen yet

Name: Natasha
Pos_Review: Beautiful, large, modern room in a new hotel. Walking distance to main areas
Neg_Review: It was a little dark in the room with not the best lighting. Every morning we were woken up by construction work next door. Clearly not the hotels fault but unfortunately impacted our sleep - not great for light sleepers!

Name: Robert
Pos_Review: clean, modern, brilliant staff
Neg_Review: nothingâ€¦ it doesnâ€™t try to be anything other than functional and comfortable

Name: Siu
Pos_Review: stayed for 4 nights at room 504, feels like a freshly built hotel / everything worked well in general / that single door for shower and toilet area was a bit of a surprise at first but indeed a smart design after getting used to it / staff is nice / location is brilliant, a 24-hr convenience store just around the corner of the road, and food, and coffee shops / the complimentary coffee from the bar certainly a plus
Neg_Review:
the tv sometimes didn't connect to the Internet during daytime, never encountered such at night
the door may not lock properly if just leave it close by itself, easily resolved if you force it to close, tricky though as you wouldn't notice just from its appearance
the glass wall of toilet/shower is a bit too transparent

Name: Esther
Pos_Review: The staffs are amazing. They are friendly and helpful from the front desk to the doorbell/ security. The room itself is very clean and well though out, nice minimalist design and very functional. Itâ€™s near a lot of eateries in the area and still in good walking proximities (15-20 mins) to museums etc.
Neg_Review: You can hear when someone is talking in the corridor (coming out of the lift) but itâ€™s not that they stay for long there.

Name: Midwaymetals
Pos_Review: It is a brand new hotel with very comfortabe rooms and nice bathrooms well designed layout with desk to allow some work as well. The location is really good and staff very good and helpful.
Neg_Review: I asked 3 times for a tax invoice and was told it would be emailed and had to ring and email again to finally get the requested invoice.

Name: X
Pos_Review: clean space and comfortable colors
Neg_Review: the bathroom door was broken at first but the staff fixed it

Name: Samuel
Pos_Review: The location is excellent as the surrounding neighborhood is away from the touristy areas but still packed with street food, coffee houses and restaurants.   The front desk staff was very friendly and helpful.  The internet was fast and reliable.
Neg_Review: The bathroom shower drains very slowly.  If you take a shower longer than 1 minute than it will overflow to the point where water will seep out the shower door and into the bathroom and into the room itself.  I had to turn the water off several times during the shower to wait for the water to drain before resuming.   The sound of the elevator bell can be heard from the room.  There is poor sound insulation as I can hear neighbors talking down the hall.

Name: Kate
Pos_Review: The staff on reception, particularly Carrot-Phuong -Fo went out of his way to help me book an outward journey coach :) Such a lovely enthusiastic and totally professional young man.
Neg_Review: There was an unfortunate mistake with room cleaningâ€¦.. however the manageress apologised and helped as best she could!

Name: Socheata
Pos_Review: The new location (Triple E Hotel 156) had a deluxe suite that was incredibly spacious. The room had a bath tub as well which was a nice surprise upgrade from Triple E Hotel 146. The staff were lovely and accommodating whether they were the receptionist or the security guard out front. They were as helpful as they could be regarding any questions or problems we had.
Neg_Review: The twin room at 156 seemed to be quite smaller than the twin room at 146, which was a bit unfortunate. There was a strange smell of cigarettes that would linger in the rooms, we'd have to turn on the air conditioner to get rid of it.

Name: Yohanesbule
Pos_Review: The hotel is very new. Like 3 months old. Location is superb. New bedding, brand new smart TV, clever mechanism on the bathroom door.
Neg_Review: Standard of the hotel is OK, yet it can be improved somehow to become small and excellent.

Name: Tjiska
Pos_Review: Exceptional customer service provided by staff - great tour and restaurant recommendations upon request as well as prompt and responsive support for all travel related needs. Beds were very comfortable and walk in shower a real plus! Located in great neighborhood with wonderful restaurant, The Hidden House, about a minute walk from hotel. Great coffee served in morning!
Neg_Review: I enjoyed everything - no complaints.

Name: Maciej
Pos_Review: Almost all was ok....
Neg_Review: Note to the owner: The first 4 seconds of my stay was the most important!  Unfortunately, the dirty paint on the walls and ceiling in the lobby prevented me from giving you the highest rating.

Name: Albert
Pos_Review: Friendly and helpful staff. Hotel was comfortable and clean. You can walk to some tourist attractions.
Neg_Review: The location was in a  run down district.

Name: Ching-yang
Pos_Review: Good location and new condition.

Name: Brenda
Pos_Review: good location and pleasant staff and clean and quiet and comfortable
Neg_Review: communication was challenging as not much English spoken.  they sprayed bug spray just in the night when we arrived back and it was quite noxious smelling in our room.

Name: Choi
Pos_Review: spacious
Neg_Review: leaking of water from shower room

Name: Graham
Pos_Review: Very freshly decorated, clean and comfortable room with very effective shower. Only drawback is lack of breakfast facility but there are plenty of cafes in the same block.

Name: Rebecca
Pos_Review: The location is amazing.  Very clean.  Nice staff. Brand new everything.
Neg_Review: The bed was on the more firm side.

Name: Mario
Pos_Review: The staff was very nice, the hotel was clean.
Neg_Review:
There are 3 "Triple E" hotel, we took a cab to the wrong one, be carefull. This is something that happens a lot from what we saw.
-The pillows were too big

Name: Susan
Pos_Review: very functional and stripped down style.  clean and in a good location.  staff very helpful.
Neg_Review: no breakfast available.

Name: Brenda
Pos_Review: helpful and attentive.  property was clean and the room was comfortable and quiet despite being over the road. A/C was good and necessary.
Neg_Review: Staffsâ€™ English was limited, so challenging to communicate but manageable, especially with translate app. they warned us that they would be spraying for bugs, but I thought they meant outdoors.  after we went to our room, however, they sprayed in hallways and  not only was it noisy but extremely noxious.  that was a bit negative as I already was suffering headache.

Name: Jenna
Pos_Review: The staff was super helpful, the room was clean and modern, the location was great! I felt safe!

Name: Matthew
Pos_Review:
Room was very nicely decorated and a super comfy bed. 
Location was good also,
staff very friendly.
TV had youtube & netflix too so that was a nice bonus!
Neg_Review: Shower drain was blocked and caused a little flood in our room.

Name: Van
Pos_Review: New and clean facilities!

Name: Ugor2
Pos_Review: New hotel in the center of SGN. Room was very clean. Bedding set was fresh and clean. A lot of Cafe and small shops around.
Neg_Review: A little bit bouncy pillow as for me, I prefer more soft.

Name: Thien
Neg_Review: They should inform customers in advance about the extra charge (for late checkout).

Name: Heather
Pos_Review: Good location in District 1. We found good restaurants, rooftop bars and coffee spots nearby. Great air conditioning in lobby when you come back from the hot city. Friendly staff. Room was very comfortable, bed and pillows superb. Room cleaned every day and fresh towels and linen if requested. Has a laundry service too.
Neg_Review: The bar was not open until late and at times they had no alcohol to make drinks or have any beers left. Definitely need to improve this as advertised bar and offers etc but this was not substantiated.

Name: Hadfina
Pos_Review: The design of the room and friendly staff

Name: Zeena
Pos_Review:
Friendly staff, great location near a lot of food and coffee spots.
Clean facilities and thoughtfully ran the AC

Name: Anne
Pos_Review: Great location and breakfast
Neg_Review: Room had a window to a concrete wall 1 metre away, floor had food spill by the bed that had not been cleaned from previous guest.

Name: Sophia
Pos_Review: Great location and facilities. Hotel and room really clean and comfortable.

Name: Gladys
Neg_Review: Cleanliness could be improved

Name: Jacques
Pos_Review: everything

Name: Andrik
Pos_Review: Good location, male staffs were great - especially Henry, exemplary staff.
Neg_Review: My room was on the 7th floor (highest) - despite this, I had 5 sleepless nights as the unit faces the street and its a constant car horns, engines and people talking. I could hear people talking at the ground floor. I spoke to the staff and they said to change room would be a downgrade of the room-type. Plus it seems they are already 100% aware of this issue. The car noises are a constant barrage throughout the night - peaking at 5am onwards. This is a shame because it would've been a 5/5 stay but not being able to sleep for 5 nights has killed my travel experience.

Name: Roshan
Pos_Review: Everything

Name: Karl
Pos_Review: Extremely clean, comfortable the nicest staff I have ever met.

Name: P
Pos_Review:
Very clean modernist hotel in a good location.
My room was very spacious with a beautiful tub, facing the back so no street noise at all.
Breakfast had a freshly made omelets and a good selection of fruit.
Hotel staff were very courteous and helpful.
Neg_Review:
Most days had no hot plate for vegetarian food.
So i just had my omelet and fruit every morning.

Name: Sam
Pos_Review: Great aesthetic and comfortable

Name: Thá»‹
Pos_Review: Located in the central, very quiet & clean.

Name: Kitanova
Pos_Review: Outstanding service, beautiful property and rooms.
Neg_Review: n/a

Name: Wesley
Pos_Review: Totally did not expect it to be so convenient in terms of location. It was nearby most of the places we wanted to visit. Everything else was spot on!

Name: Abi
Pos_Review: Room was spacious enough for 2 people and open luggages. Nice industrial, minimal design. The bathroom was clean and also very roomy! Staff were helpful when needed. Good location in district 1, close to many places to eat, Ben Thanh and shopping areas.

Name: Westy1889
Neg_Review: Noisy room.. Some kind of generator or machine comes on at adhoc intervals, woke me up a few times.

Name: Madhi
Pos_Review: Honestly, everything was great. The hotel itself is in a great location with lots of restaurants and shops nearby. You are a short walk away from Ben Thanh market and Saigon Centre. The room was great and comfortable. Blackout curtains helped. The bathroom was spacious and had everything you needed. The staff were all friendly and helpful. Would definitely recommend it, and I would stay there again if I ever find myself in HCMC. It was a bit on the expensive side for me, but it was worth the money spent for the last few days in Vietnam. I also loved the fact that I could connect to my netflix account on the tv
Neg_Review: I don't think it's dislike, but the fact that there are two properties next to each other with the same name. After a delay and arriving close to 4 am, I couldn't figure out where to go. This was the only thing that wasn't clear enough, and I had 2 instances where people I was supposed to meet ended up waiting for me at the other property

Name: Kirill
Pos_Review: Really near by the center. Silent, comfortable. Well equip room.

Name: Mohammad
Pos_Review: Best stay so far in Vietnam in general.. highly recommended. New rooms ( 5 stars level) .Only disadvantage that there is no swimming pool . Staff were very helpful and let me shower after checking out in special bathroom.
Neg_Review: Nothing

Name: Palak
Pos_Review:
The hotel is in a great location, with many shops close by. We could also walk to the hotel from the main road comfortably. 

The staff was very helpful and the breakfast buffet was especially good. Would recommend this to others!

Name: Michel
Pos_Review: Comfortable, large shower room.
Neg_Review: Breakfast was not varied. It missed some pastries.

Name: Ayako
Pos_Review: I appreciated the location, conveniently close to the cityâ€™s main attractions.
Neg_Review: The walls were very thin, and there was constant noise from running water nearby, as loud as if it were in the same room. There was no electric kettle provided in the room. The gym was not in an enclosed space but situated in front of a cafÃ©, making it unsuitable for anyone serious about working out. Additionally, not many staff members spoke good English.

Name: Paulina
Pos_Review: Very modern nice and relaxing hotel in the heart of the city. Quiet spacious rooms with comfortable beds and a lovely breakfast buffet. The staff is polite and helpful. We were happy with our stay.

Name: Sharon
Pos_Review: Triple E hotel is centrally located, walking distance to the night market and restaurants are mostly nearby. Philip and Henry staff at the concierge are so helpful and knowleagble to the tourist places! Breakfast are really good and this hotel is highly recommended!!!!
Neg_Review: none! very much satisfied with our 1 week stay!

Name: Arsenijevic
Pos_Review: Convenient location with a lot of local bars and restaurants. Breakfast was basic but really good, especially the pho and omelette made on spot. We had a nice view on the neighbourhood buildings and very cozy room, with smart TV, hairdryer and big shower in the bathroom.

Name: Samuel
Pos_Review: Fantastic staff, great location and great breakfast. Room was very comfortable. Close to Bien Vuu walking street.
Neg_Review: Pillows could be a little firmer.

Name: Lara
Pos_Review: Very central location. Very modern design of hotel and the room - we loved the bath tube in the middle of the room and the pool table in the lobby. Very, very clean bathroom and new furniture/bath appliances. Nothing seemed rundown in the room. The bed was super comfortable. Room also offered a great view on HCMC skyline and two chairs. Everyday two small water bottles for free and free coffee/tea.
Neg_Review: TV wasnâ€™t working and window could only be opened a crack. The rest was amazing.

Name: Ramon
Pos_Review: Staff were very polite and helpful. Our room had a king sized bed! Great central location too..just a 10 min walk to Ben Thanh market. Free coffee too! Will definitely stay there again.

Name: Mehtap
Pos_Review: Great location, helpful staff, big room with everything you need

Name: Craig
Pos_Review: This was the 3rd time myself and my friends have stayed at the Triple E. It's our go to location in HCMC. The staff are very friendly and helpful, the location is perfect and it's a short walk to the markets, money changer, food street etc. We always book the Deluxe King Rooms, and we are never disappointed. It is excellent value for money and the breakfast is nice.
Neg_Review: There are no complaints.

Name: Bazz
Pos_Review: Staff here are exceptional. Nothing is a problem  !

Name: Christianus
Pos_Review: the location and staff
Neg_Review: the surroundings, the place around is quite old and smelly

Name: Christianus
Pos_Review: close to the city center
Neg_Review: quite smelly because the location surrounding is quite old

Name: Wahine01
Pos_Review: The hotel offered a delicious and varied breakfast. The location was central, clean, and the staff were friendly and spoke good English:)
Neg_Review: None

Name: Shi-ting
Pos_Review:
Staff came out to help with luggage the moment we arrived, and even helped to load into the grab when we checked out. 

Housekeeping was well done every day. The place is as clean as it looks in pictures! 

Bathroom has a bidet, shower was very comfortable to use, with good temperature control and water pressure. We requested for the wooden toilet door for privacy and our request was granted. 

Even though our room type didnâ€™t have a view, there was still a window with natural light (view is obscured by fire escape stairs) 

Location is decent, there are a few things within walking distance, and not hard to get a grab either.
Neg_Review:
This hotel has two buildings almost side by side, it would be good if you were informed which one to check in at beforehand. 

Breakfast is a bit early so we never tried it!

Name: Peter
Pos_Review: Clean and comfortable- really good breakfast. Friendly staff. Lots of places to eat nearby

Name: M
Pos_Review: Location
Neg_Review: The room they give us was top floor which is you take elevator then out then stairs one floor more and then you have smelly room ever and hot as hell

Name: Madri
Pos_Review: Absolutely loved the hotel. The staff was super helpful and the room was super clean and tidy. Location was perfect, close to everything and we can highly recommend the hotel to other guests. Amenities in the room was also great!
Neg_Review: We liked everything!

Name: Harry
Pos_Review:
Modern hotel, my room was large, clean and quiet (first floor).
Walking distance to main shopping areas and good food options near.
Staff are friendly. I would stay again.

Name: Justyna
Pos_Review: Nice hotel
Neg_Review: Bad breakfast , I couldnâ€™t eat too much there apart from dry baguette ğŸ¥– with jam . I stayed in few places during my travel and I chosen this based on reviews , but not sure why no one mentioned the breakfast itself.

Name: Renasha
Pos_Review: Gorgeous place. I decided to stay here again on my return to HCMC after a short stay in Phu Quoc. Rooms are exactly as shown but even smarter. Super clean and very thoughtfully designed. Location was amazing too as short walk away from Ben Thanh market. The bed was super comfy too. I loved staying here and the best place to start my trip in Vietnam!
Neg_Review: Nothing

Name: Rle1
Pos_Review: clean room
Neg_Review: Noisy with room on street side (while I requested many days before for a quiet room), seems they did not put attention to the message as receptionist did not comment when handling keys.

Name: Frank
Pos_Review: We had a room at the back and I can honestly say of all of the hotels we stayed in in Vietnam, this was among the quietest, despite the fact that you are in the middle of Ho Chi Minh City. The bed was large and comfortable as well and the staff recommended us a fantastic Pho place nearby.
Neg_Review: The breakfast options were a bit limited when it comes to vietnamese breakfast, but the rest was fine!

Name: Lily
Pos_Review: The hotel was very clean and modern. The beds were comfortable. The bathroom was very nice. The staff arranged for us to come back and have showers after check out before our flight. The hotel bar had great coffee and hot chocolate.
Neg_Review: Breakfast could have more options.

Name: Sarah
Pos_Review: What a fantastic location in D1 in the heart of Saigon, easy walkable to major attractions and surrounded by local coffee shops and Pho restaurants
Neg_Review: All perfect

Name: Cornelia
Pos_Review: Very friendly and helpful staff. Good breakfast. Good location.

Name: Mary
Pos_Review: New
Neg_Review: Water spills out of the shower room almost always after one showers

Name: Julia
Pos_Review: Breakfast was very good. It accommodated for western and Vietnamese style meals.
Neg_Review: The walls are a bit thin, you can hear normal conversation through the door

Name: Jamie
Pos_Review:
This place was awesome, excellent bed, staff, room shower etc. Wifi and Netflix was pumping lol, breaky wasn't too bad either.
Staff were nice and helpful.
Neg_Review: Not much really,

Name: Cindy
Pos_Review:
The front staff was very nice and helpful as well as the cleaning staff!
Breakfast staff was very nice and breakfast was fine. Hair salon across the street was great too!
Neg_Review: All was good

Name: Stephanie
Pos_Review: Location great, staff amazing, sound proofing so very quiet and comfortable in the room, very clean.

Name: Thibault
Pos_Review: The room was very pleasant : large space, comfortable bed and with a nice window with view on Bitexco tower.
Neg_Review:
- Breakfast was very average for the price I paid for the room : quite boring food and always the same during the 4 days I have stayed in this hotel 
- Noise was a big issue : from my room I could clearly ear through the night the elevator sound, people talking or door being shut. There is big issue of noise insulation.

Name: Carol
Pos_Review: Good location it was light and bright
Neg_Review: You only got one room key need key to use lift friends were on different floor could go to their room  shower sprayed under the wall into the toilet staff donâ€™t speak good English breakfast could have had more western options

Name: Esmee
Pos_Review: Best one we had during our stay in Vietnam!

Name: Linh
Pos_Review: Reasonable price with great hospitality. The location is also convenient. Shout out to WILL who welcomed and helped us a lot. Definitely coming back next time I visit Saigon.

Name: Nicole
Pos_Review:
Very convenient location. Helpful, polite staff.
Good breakfast. Clean rooms with all the necessary amenities. Comfortable bed.
Neg_Review: Could have better soundproofing of the windows as street noise can be loud.

Name: Ninomae
Pos_Review: Great location, very friendly staff, and good price. Breakfast is delicious too.
Neg_Review: Nothing really, it's great value for the price. Staff were all friendly.

Name: Krista
Pos_Review: Great location, good environment and service!
Neg_Review: Breakfast tea and coffee can be improved!

Name: Marco
Pos_Review: The staff very helpful and accepted our reservation through booking  at 1 o'clock in the middle of the night.
Neg_Review: I would suggest to add to breakfast more sweet options and local fruits

Name: Bill
Pos_Review:
Great staff, great location, great value.

Hotel exceeded my expectations for the price paid. Staff (especially Kent) weâ€™re exceptionally attentive and couldnâ€™t do enough to make our stay enjoyable.

This will be my go to hotel when in Ho Chi Minh.
Neg_Review: There was nothing not to like about this hotel

Name: Aimee
Pos_Review: Great location and lovely room

Name: Pamela
Pos_Review: Location was great but a bit confusing because there are 2 Triple E hotels next to each other

Name: Christine
Pos_Review:
Good location with minimart and restaurants nearby

Love the bed, itâ€™s so comfy. Room is also spacious and clean

Breakfast is simple but good

Staff are really friendly and approachable
Neg_Review: Nothing

Name: Nguyen
Pos_Review: Staffs are super friendly & helpful, good location with restaurants around, room is clean & bed is very comfy.

Name: Damien
Pos_Review: Great location in central Ho Chi Minh. Within walking distance of all the major sights. Nice rooms and friendly staff.

Name: Nguyen
Pos_Review: Nice clean modearn spacious room
Neg_Review: Breakfast is alright but could add more varieties

Name: Msm
Pos_Review: Thet staff are nice and helpful, the room is clean

Name: Alisha
Pos_Review: Great location. Super comfortable, very clean

Name: Lauren
Pos_Review: Omelette bar at breakfast was amazing. Great room with city view. Staff couldnâ€™t have been nicer.

Name: Emma
Pos_Review: The breakfast was nice but not many western options but still something there that you would enjoy regardless
Neg_Review: Everything was amazing

Name: Kimberly
Pos_Review: Excellent service! The room was beautiful, modern, comfortable, spacious and clean. Great breakfast options and an ideal location, close to food, attractions, stores, and coffee.
Neg_Review: N/A

Name: Zayda
Pos_Review:
The breakfast is so good and refreshing! It exceeded my expectations as I thought it will just be plain bread and some local food. They had bacon and sausages everyday, the butter is so tasty, the orange juice is very refreshing and pho was so delicious! 
Location is 10 minutes walk from Ben Tanh, the area seems like on the residential/commercial side so it is more quiet unlike those near the market. There are a few food choices around. All staff were very friendly and polite.
Neg_Review:
Water pressure is too low.
There is a sliding window in the room which seems not secured, maybe the can fix to close it.

Name: Javier
Pos_Review: Location is great. The breakfast was delicious. The staff was very kind and helpful.

Name: Minh
Pos_Review: service
Neg_Review: nothing

Name: Ming
Pos_Review: convenient locarion and high-quality bathroom equipment
Neg_Review:
only one breakfast ticket even I stayed for 2 nights 3 days

hotel lobby is so dark

Name: Ng
Pos_Review: the staff was friendly and very helpful
Neg_Review: water flows out of the cubical into the room when showering, no pool, hot water was inconsistent ( at the same settings it gets too hot/cold within seconds), lack of lift to my level (I stay 8 but lift only goes to 7)

Name: Phuong
Pos_Review: clean modern fast and good customer service
Neg_Review: nothing

Name: Francis
Pos_Review:
This hotel is great. walk distance to convenient store, nearby centre and also market street.
Staff also very helpfull. Mr, Victor he can suggest you which food nearby is nice.
and the security Mr. Pang also is nice person.
room is clean.
Neg_Review: Nothing

Name: Yoshinori
Pos_Review: Staff were very helpful

Name: Kristine
Pos_Review: clean, new, good location
Neg_Review: staff were okay but could have been friendlier and accommodating

Name: Joshua
Pos_Review:
Not a single thing to fault about this place.

Staff were lovely and always smiling, the lobby and buffet was beautiful, location very good (a 5 minute walk to Ben Thanh market), also some amazing restaurants and food close by.

The room itself exceeded my expectations, very spacious and bigger than I thought it would be.

The bed was to DIE FOR! Oh my goodness, I've never had a better sleep in my life.

Bathroom was spotless and very modern, the view was as expected being surrounded by buildings.

I will be staying here again on my next trip, no doubt about it
Neg_Review: Nil

Name: Pornvilai
Pos_Review: Everything
Neg_Review: Nothing

Name: Eirini
Pos_Review: Very clean and excellent staff. The most comfortable beds ever.

Name: David
Pos_Review: Clean modern facility with great AC, comfortable bed and good shower. Delightful young staff are professional and helpful. Great location within walking distance of most District zone sights and restaurants.

Name: Jasminka
Pos_Review: location
Neg_Review: rooms hardly have ANY VIEW

Name: Betty
Pos_Review: new hotel , spacious room , nice decor , very clean , great staffs
Neg_Review: no breakfast buffet but they said itâ€™s coming

Name: Bryonyl
Pos_Review: Very clean and comfortable.  New and modern facilities.  Great location and would definitely stay here again.

Name: Aleksandra
Country: United Arab Emirates (CaÌc TiÃªÌ‰u VÆ°Æ¡ng QuÃ´Ìc AÌ‰ RÃ¢Ì£p ThÃ´Ìng NhÃ¢Ìt)
Pos_Review: Centrally located hotel, walking distance from most of the attractions, very clean and brand new. Staff members are lovely and very helpful. Highly recommended!

Name: Nickjdas
Pos_Review: Great staff, very friendly, great location. Room was very clean, spacious and had everything I needed to a great standard

Name: Lydia
Pos_Review: The location of the hotel was perfect. You could walk to the main attractions while also being in a quiet neighborhood. The  room was very spacious and the beds quite comfortable.

Name: Chris
Pos_Review: This is a great boutique hotel in the centre of district 1. The room was very clean and modern with a great bathroom and all the amenities that you would expect.
Neg_Review:
This hotel doesnâ€™t offer any food options but they do have a coffee bar in the reception area. Other than this, the hotel does offer any other facilities.
Despite this itâ€™s still a great place to lay your head after a busy day and night in the amazing Saigon.

Name: Adam
Pos_Review:
Nice new hotel with great room with all u need including desk, the bathroom was really good and bed super comfortable. 

It's in walking distance of most district 1 attractions , shopping, bars restaurants .

Overall a fantastic stay and my 2nd visit and I will stay there again for sure
Neg_Review: Nothing

Name: Eveline
Pos_Review:
the staff were very helpful, taking time to explain the online flight check-in (which you canâ€™t do if you are flying to another country.)
I give full marks for them.
the hotel is very central to all the attractions around.
Neg_Review:
Unfortunately, the room was like a cement box, grey/beige walls and very little daylight coming into the room as the window was facing another wall about half a meter away. we needed to turn all the lights on in the middle of the day to see anything. (a colourful picture on the wall would help to brighten up the cell).

the hotel had a coffee/ drink bar in the next building but not fully serviceable (no milk for different coffees in the morning).

Name: Kolafa
Pos_Review: Staff is very friendly and hospitable. Location is great in close proximity to big attractions, yet the street itself is quiet enough to be able to sleep peacefully at night.

Name: Duncan
Pos_Review: lovely comfy beds and good size rooms. we had single suites

Name: Jaroslav
Pos_Review: I was in Saigon many times, but this hotel really surprised me. Very clean, new, modern, good quality of materials used, helpful staff, relatively cheap, near to restaurants and coffee. I can recommend.

Name: Petar
Pos_Review: clean, location, new
Neg_Review: nothing

Name: Ivanina
Pos_Review: Very nice hotel, very clean, staff were friendly and helpful, room was with a good view and good size, water pressure was amazing, even on 7th floor.

Name: Diazsprite
Pos_Review: Great location, breakfast not available at this point, but many coffee's around, very good value for money, recommended for few days stay

Name: Raelene
Pos_Review: Great location and amazing staff! We really enjoyed our stay.

Name: Katherine
Pos_Review: I liked how clean and modern it was

Name: Dan
Pos_Review: great location and very clean with great staff

Pos_Review: Staff very helpful and friendly. Great location e comfortable room. Highly recommended :)

Name: Ian

Name: Alok
Pos_Review: the property is exceptionally good. very neat and clean with excellent staff who were very helpful

Pos_Review:
Bed was very comfy
Apartment was super clean

Hotel is brand new - everything is bright and shiny
Neg_Review: Minimal amenities - it's practically the room and nothing else, more of an apartment than hotel (which is still fine)

Pos_Review:
The house keep staff are nice and friendly

Name: Javier
Pos_Review: New and modern.

Name: Andrew

Name: Andrew

Name: Fabienne
Pos_Review: The room was fantastic and the bed was extremely comfortable. In the room you have a mini fridge along with a mini bar, free coffee and tea. Bew water hurtles weâ€™re given daily. Really made you feel welcomed and comfortable.
Neg_Review: nothing

Name: Patrick
Pos_Review: The staff are amazing, the hotel is one of the cleanest hotels I have stayed in, so new and the rooms are decent sized and also within walking distance to ben Thanh market, Saigon centre and bui vien street . The street is very quite at night and not too busy during the day, We have really enjoyed our stay here ( the second time in 2 weeks)  I am looking forward to our next stay in Saigon.
Neg_Review: there is absolutely nothing to complain about.

Name: Vincent
Pos_Review: The staff are great - from the security man at the door, porters, cleaners and receptionists, all do a first-class job. We booked another stay to follow our trip to Phu Coc and I can recommend this hotel heartily.

Name: Sala

Name: Steffen
Pos_Review: Uns hat das Hotel so gut gefallen, dass wir nach ein paar Tagen Aufenthalt im Mekong-Delta noch einmal hierher zurÃ¼ck gekehrt sind. Das Hotel ist der perfekte Ausgangspunkt, um die groÃŸartige Stadt Saigon ausgiebig zu FuÃŸ zu erkunden. In unmittelbarer NÃ¤he des Hotels befinden sich mehrere Restaurants, CafÃ©s, SupermÃ¤rkte und ein tolles Spa. Die Zimmer sind sauber und gepflegt, alles Notwendige ist vorhanden. Das Personal ist unaufdringlich aber prÃ¤sent und stets zur Stelle, wenn man ein Anliegen hat. Allgemein herrscht erkennbar eine gute ArbeitsatmosphÃ¤re im Hotel, was ja immer ein gutes Zeichen ist. Die Kritik am FrÃ¼hstÃ¼ck kann ich nicht nachvollziehen. NatÃ¼rlich handelt es sich nicht um ein 5-Sterne-FrÃ¼hstÃ¼ck, aber man kann sich verschiedene Eierspeisen und Pho-Suppe frisch zubereiten lassen, es gibt Salat, Obst, warme Speisen, Cerealien, was will man mehr.

Neg_Review: Premetto che dopo un mese di viaggio in Vietnam, questo Ã¨ il peggior hotel da me sperimentato non solo in Vietnam, ma anche nella mia esperienza pluridecennale di viaggi. La stanza molto sporca, piena di capelli neri sul pavimento e sul letto, nessuno ha soddisfatto la mia richiesta di pulire. Molto sporco anche il corridoio. Una sera abbiamo avuto solo un filo di acqua bollente dal rubinetto (anche se posizionato su acqua fredda) e niente acqua in doccia. Al check out ci hanno fatto aprire la valigia nella hall sostenendo che dalla stanza mancava un appendiabiti e una decorazione floreale, che ovviamente non hanno trovato nella valigia. Alla mia richiesta di parlare con il direttore, mi Ã¨ stato risposto che non era possibile. Saremmo dovuto tornare per altre due notti dopo un'escursione fuori cittÃ , siamo fuggiti nell'hotel di fronte, che presenta le stesse caratteristiche ma Ã¨ decisamente piÃ¹ pulito e costa esattamente la metÃ .

Neg_Review: Bed was hard & no window in the room

Name: David
Pos_Review:
Location.
The FO was very kind & helpfull; same as the securitystaff
Neg_Review:
Too noisy, rooms have no soundproof.
Bedroom floor was not clean properly

Name: Kendall
Pos_Review: Clean room and bed.
Neg_Review: Nothing

Name: Trung
Pos_Review: Close to the airport and the room is clean
Neg_Review: The room size is a bit small

Name: Leetsui
Pos_Review: Location close to the airport. Nice enough reception smart tv with apps
Neg_Review: Beds are too firm and pillows too fat and bouncy to be comfortable. Shower flooded

Name: Hoang
Pos_Review: Nice room, near airport

Name: Harry
Pos_Review: The whole room was very clean and comfortable. The shower in particular was great. After travelling for a while it was nice to have a hot and powerful shower to clean up in. We were also given a voucher for 2 coffees in the morning, which was great to start the day with.

Name: Pham
Pos_Review: Clean, organized.
Neg_Review: A bit cramp.

Name: Krystal
Pos_Review: Clean and very aesthetically pleasing, in great location

Name: Christopher
Pos_Review: This hotel was so clean and comfortable, with super close access to the airport. The staff were welcoming and friendly. I highly recommend it!

Name: Tritam
Pos_Review: It was very modern, clean and it has everything

Name: Victoria
Pos_Review: Very good shower. The hotel will do for a one night sleep not more.
Neg_Review: Not a nice area for tourists. Service could be better. The ladies at the reception were not too helpful, offered us to use Google for our enquiry. No window in the room without any information on that. No sound proof - you can hear any tiny sound from the corridor and rooms around.

Name: Michael
Pos_Review: room was never cleaned. hair everywhere. so sick
Neg_Review: cleaning

Name: Nerjie
Pos_Review:
The place is beautiful, It was a 3 minute walk to the location of our convention, there are a lot of food and coffee shops nearby ğŸ˜„
It even has free laundry

Name: Chayser
Pos_Review: Very accommodating staff and always has the initiative to ask if we need help ğŸ¥°

Name: Russell
Pos_Review: Nothing
Neg_Review: Mostly everything

Name: Anamaria
Pos_Review: Staff was nice and attentive
Neg_Review: Location, far from everything despite saying was located in the heart of the city, you canâ€™t walk around as thereâ€™s nothing close, besides surroundings are not very nice.

Name: Charlie
Pos_Review: The room was very nice and better than the photos online
Neg_Review: The staff are not very welcoming, not even a smile as you walk past them in the lobby. They didnâ€™t say hello except for check in or check out. The key card states there is a gym and sauna however this is not the case

Name: Quang
Pos_Review: We leave early in the morning, before they open

Name: Elisabetta
Pos_Review: Me and my husband got a long stop over on our way to Indonesia, so we decide to wonder in Ho Chi Min staying close to the airport. The position was perfect, just 10 min from the airport and about 25 min from city centre by bus. Staff was kind, room perfectly clean and they got a very nice roof top.

Name: Simon
Neg_Review: Quite expensive compared to other hotels of similar quality. Bed uncomfortable.

Name: Hooi
Pos_Review: Super noisy and renovation goin on

Name: Nur
Pos_Review: The location made it easy to visit landmarks like Ben Thanh Market and very close to Tan Dinh Market. The staff did their best to accommodate our needs. Highly recommend!!

Name: Aiden
Pos_Review: Perfect for people on vacation, the hotel has excellent facilities and a balcony with a beautiful view. The location is ideal, near the city center, providing easy access to various attractions and shopping areas

Name: Joyce
Pos_Review:
De buitenkant van het hotel en de receptie zijn mooi en de badkamer is ook heel netjes.
De kamer is best groot.
Er staat een wasmachine en droger in het hotel waar je gratis gebruik van kunt maken. (Er is ook waspoeder, maar ik raad aan om zelf wat mee te nemen i.v.m een lekkerdere geur)
Een grote supermarkt ligt op ongeveer vijf minuten lopen.
Neg_Review:
De kamers zijn absoluut niet geluidsdicht. Je hoort echt alles.
De hotel gangen zijn sterk verouderd.
Bij de receptie is een bar met tafeltjes. Ze mogen dat wel wat beter bijhouden met opruimen. Het afval op de tafels lag er vaak uren later nog. Of zet er op z'n minst een prullenbak neer, zodat klanten hun afval kunnen weggooien.
